( siri-risahanāhacariyaṁ )
namaha1 jugāijiṇidaṁ purisōttimanābhisaṁbhavaṁ payaḍaṁ
varanāṇa- daṁsaṇa- raviṁ sugayamaṇaṁtaṁ mahādēvaṁ
ēgamaṇēgasarūvaṁ dullakkha paramajōgi paccakkhaṁ
avvayamasaṁkhamakkhayamōsappiṇipaḍhamatitthayaraṁ
saṁkuddha - sakka - vikkhitta ditta - daṁbhōli-daṇa-bhayabhīō
saraṇaṁ saraṇaṁ ti tumaṁ bhagavaṁ ! maha hōha japatō
jassa bhuvaṇēkkaguruṇō payaṁtaraṁ pāviūṇa asuriṁdō
sakkāō vi na saṁkai sō saraṇaṁ maha mahāvīrō
ajiyāī jayapayaḍē arihaṁtē paramapūyamarihaṁtē
arahaṁtē aruhaṁtē namāmi siripāsanāhaṁtē
suya-sāyara-pāragayaṁ bharaha suyaṁ risahagaṇaharaṁ paḍhamaṁ
viyasiya- puṁḍariya-muhaṁ puṁḍariyaṁ gaṇaharaṁ vaṁdē
khaṁtikhamaṁ vijiyakkhaṁ dakkhaṁ kiriyāsu mōkkhagayalakkhaṁ
vīrassa paḍhamasīsaṁ gōyamagaṇahāriṇaṁ namimō
jāō ajōggayassa vi jāṇa pasāēṇa majjha guṇajōgō
tāṇamaṇaṁta-guṇāṇaṁ guruṇa paya-paṁkayaṁ sarimō
aṇṇēya mahākaiṇō varamuṇiṇō jē ya kē vi iha guṇiṇō
kali-kayavara-kamalasamā jayaṁtu tē piṁḍiyā 3 savvē
ēgēṇa vāma- hatthēṇa pōtthayaṁ bīyaēṇa maṇiyāli
taiēṇa 4 dāhiṇēṇaṁ karēṇa kamalaṁ dharēmāṇī
saralaṁgu li- vivara-viṇissa raṁtalāyanna-jala - pavāhēṇaṁ
turiēṇa tihuyaṇassa vi varappayāṇaṁ karēmāṇī
viyasiya-vara - kamalagayā siya-vasaṇā kuṁda- kaliya- sama-dasaṇā
kaviyaṇa-muhakayavāsā sarassaī jayai supayāsā 5
assyanayaṇāṇaṁdō nivvaviyāsēsa mahiyalābhōgō
sāraya-sasivva suhaō jaya-payaḍō sajjanō jayai
amuṇiyaguṇaparimāṇō gayaṇābhōgō vva nimmala - sahāvō
jō khaṁḍiō vi na muyai niyapayaī caṁdaṇa - taru vva
lēi guṇē cciya, dōsē dūraṁ pariharai kavvamajjhāō
dhayaraṭṭhō viva suyaṇō mōttūṇa payaṁ payaṁ piyai
dōsamaliṇaṁ pi kavvaṁ suyaṇē paḍiyaṁ sunimmalaṁ hōi
maliṇō vi ki kuraṁgō na sahai sasi - maṁḍalārūḍhō ?
samalaṁ pisuddha hiyayā dasadisi - pasaraṁ tanimmala-payāvā
vimalaṁ kuṇati kavvaṁ bhuvaṇaṁ dinanāha-kiraṇō vva
tē viralā jē guṇiṇō guṇarāgō jāṇa tē vi iha viralā
na guṇī na ya guṇarāgī na maccharī tē vi dullabhā
guṇarahiyā guṇapakkhavāya vimuhā muhā vi macchariṇō
baṁbhaṁḍa-maṁḍalaṁ pihu na pahuppai tāṇa purisāṇa
khaṁḍēi" kalāvaṁtaṁ duṭṭhamuhō mittamaṁḍalaṁ druhai"
na gaṇai guruṁ pi pisuṇō tamō vva guṇamaccharī pāvō
dahṇō dahai sarīraṁ laggō aṁgēsu na uṇa dūraṭhiō
pisuṇō puṇa dūratthō vi dahai dēhaṁ na saṁdēhō
dujjaṇa- duvvayaṇa-mahāhisaṁkiō bhamai sajjanō niccaṁ
jaṁ parachiddaggāhī gharē gharē saṁti pisuṇāhī
mahu-mahurō muhapuraō pacchā puṇa kuṇai ki pitaṁ * jēṇa
ghummāvai harai jiyaṁ visaṁ va visamō khalō lōō
dukkha kīrai kavvaṁ dūsai taṁ dujjaṇō suhēṇēva
ahava jāṇai vaṁjhā jā viyaṇā pasavaṇē hōi 11
vararūva- jāi - kulubbhavāē 12 saddattha lakkhaṇadharāē
rāmacchaṁda gayā ē kahāē sīyāsaricchāē
rajjati rāmaṇō viva, suyāē diṭṭāē puṇa 13 visēsēṇa
suyaṇā, dumiti khalā khalō vva kaḍuyā sahāvēṇa

laṭṭhīē pīliō vihu kusaēṇa samāhaō vi muha-mūlē
taha vikhalōna vi mēllai khalattaṇaṁ kaḍuyabhāvaṁ ca
avagaṇṇiō vi na muyai maggaṁ 1 ḍaṁḍāhaō vi nō ṭhāi
pisuṇō sayā bhasaṁtō uvvēyaṁ kuṇai kavilō vva
adi-dōsa- pajja liya-hiyaya-dhūmaṁdhayāra khala- vayaṇē
caṁda- kiraṇa vva dhavalā kaiṇō rēhaṁti guṇanivahā
ahavā (na) cēva niṁdā kāyavvā dujjaṇāṇa vi jaṇāṇaṁ
garuyāṇa ēsa maggō dhamma kahāē visēsēṇaṁ
sā puṇa kahā duvihā -- purisapahāṇā itthipahāṇā ya। tattha purisapahāṇā harivaṁsāi, itthipahāṇā taraṁgavaīyāi । ēkkkā puṇō tivihā - atyapaḍibaddhā, kāmapaḍibaddhā, dhammapaḍibaddhā ya । tattha jīsē avahatthiyā - sēsapurisatyō atthō cēva kēvalō salahijjai -- jahā : atthavaṁtassa aguṇā' vi guṇā, asajjaṇā vi sajjaṇā, apaḍhiē vi paṁḍiyattaṇaṁ, kurūyattaṇē vi surūyattaṇaṁ4, thērattaṇē vi taruṇattaṇaṁ, aditassa vi vallahattaṇaṁ । avi ya-- *
dhaṇavaṁtahaṁ suhi sayaṇa huṁti jaṇu āṇa-paḍicchau
kajjakāli sayamēva lōu tasu hōi biijjau
rāvala dēula gaṇai bhai ēhi īsarapaisari 5
dāliddiya mana saṁdhi ṭhāu tuhuṁ bāhari 6 nīsari
jāī kulaṁ kalāō rūvaṁ viṣṇāṇa nāṇasaṁbaṁdhō
atthēṇa viṇā savvē vi guṇagaṇā tiṇasamā huti
atthō cciya para ēkkō jiyalōē dēvayā gurū jaṇaō
māyā bhāyā bhajjā suhi sayaṇa-suō na uṇa aṇṇō
kiṁ bahuṇā ? jaṁ jaṁ jaṁpai karēi vā taṁ taṁ sabbō vi jaṇō bahumannai, aō atyō cēva pahāṇapurisatyōṁ, ēyaṁ jattha vaṇijjai sā atthakahā ।
jīsē puṇa itthi purisāṇa siṁgārāgāra 7 - hāva-bhāva bibbōya-vilāsā kāmasatthapaḍibaddhā pahāṇataṇēṇa parūvijjati । tadyathā--
priyā darśanamēvāstu kimanyairdarśanāntaraiḥ
prāpyatē yēna nirvāṇaṁ sarāgēṇāpi cētasā
jai natthi tattha sīmaṁtiṇīō maṇaharapiyaṁgu vaṇṇāō
tā rē siddhatiya ! baṁdhaṇaṁ ti mōkkhō na sō mōkkhō
ēkku anukūlī gharighariṇī, annu lōi jasa paḍahara bajjai
ētthu samappaṛa mōkkha-suhu, mōkkha sukkhu ki kavalihi khajjai ?
vēraggamaṇusaratāja nidaṁ liti litu varamuṇiṇō
hiyaē puṇa tāṇa vi abhiramaṁti taruṇīyaṇa - vilāsā
ēvamāi jatthōvadaṁsijjai sā kāmakahā ।
jattha puṇa hiṁsā liya-cōrikka paradārapariggaha parihāra-parama- saṁdhi8 baṁdhaṇō suvivēya kaṇṇadhārō, saṁvara ṭhaiya- chiddō, sacca-sōya- siyavaḍō, jiṇa nijjāmayāhiṭṭhiō, saṁsāra - samudda- nimajjata-jaṁtu - nitthāraṇa 9 samattha-parama-pōya-samāṇō, sayala - jaya jīva dayālaṁkiō, dukkhiya jaṇa jaṇaṇi sannihō, sayala-kallāṇa-kāraṇaṁ, saggāpavagga-saṁsaggi-nibaṁdhaṇō, asēsa- duha-dāru- dahaṇa - dāvānalō, gōyamāi- parama purisa nisēviō kamma vāhi-mahōsahi samāṇō । avi ya-

sōyārā vi yativihā -- atthatthiyā, kāmatthiyā, viralaviralā dhammatthiyā । phalaṁ puṇa attha- kāmakahāṇaṁ caugai- saṁsārapariyahaṇaṁ, aō tapparihārēṇa appaparōvayāriṇī sabhā sappurisasēviyā dhammakā cēva kahēyavvā । sā puṇa parisāē । parisā vi duvihā uvaṭṭiyā ya aṇuvaṭṭiyā ya । uvaṭṭiyāē kahēyavvā, na uṇa iyarāē । jaō bhaṇiyaṁ--
aṇuvaṭṭiyassa dhammaṁ mā hu kahējjāsi suṭṭha vi piyassa
vicchāyaṁ hōi bhuhaṁ vijjhāyariṁga dhamaṁtassa
uvaṭṭiyā vi tivihā -- jāṇiyā, ajāṇiyā, duvvidyaḍḍhā ya । duṇhaṁ paḍhamiyāṇaṁ kahēyavvā । 1. maggē JĒ । 2. puṇa PĀ । 3. tassāviguṇā JĒ । 4. suruvatta PĀ । 5. īsara isari JĒ । 6. bāhiri PĀ । 7. siṁgārāhāva JĒ । 8. dhi saṁdhaṇōṁ PĀ । 9. nivāraṇa samatthō pa- JĒ । 10. chaḍḍivi PĀ । 11. vihīṇa PĀ । 12. jīu PĀ ।

giṇhai na aṇṇa- bhaṇiyaṁ duviyaḍḍhō vajjaṇijjō u
duhaṁ puṇa parisāṇaṁ uvaṭṭhiyāṇaṁ buhēṇa agilāē
saṁsāra- dukkha-dalaṇī dhammakahā hōi kāvvā
alamittha vittharēṇaṁ kallāṇayapaṁcarayaṇacicaiyaṁ
paṁcāhigārabaddhaṁ sui- suha-jaṇayaṁ maṇabhirāmaṁ
puṇṇaṁ paraṁ pavittaṁ kallāṇaṁ maṁgalaṁ sivaṁ dhaṇṇaṁ
vimalaṁ vimaliyabhavvaṁ jayajīvāsāsayaṁ suhayaṁ
muha-nijjharāō jhariyaṁ cariyaṁ pāēṇa risahanāhassa
kannaṁjalīhiṁ pijjau jalaṁ va sai sajjaṇajaṇēṇa
siririsahanāhassa dhanasatthavāhāibhavā —
atthi ihētra jaṁbuddīvē dīvē avaravidēhē vāsē sayalamahīmaṁḍalamaṁḍaṇaṁ, uvahasiyasurapuraṁ niyasamiddhīē, suvibhatta-tiya- cakka - caccaraṁ, suppavaṁciyavicittanaravai-pahaṁ, niyasōhāviṇijjiyasaggaṁ, visāla- vivaṇi maggaṁ, gayaṇagga- lagga-dhavala-visāla- sālōvasōhiyaṁ, pāyālōyara-gaṁbhīra-bhīma parihā-parigayaṁ nimmala maṇimaya- pāsāya- sihara - pasaraṁta kara samūha - dūrīsāriyagahagaṇa- tēyappasaraṁ, tiyasavai - sahāmaṁḍavaṁ va vibahā hiṭṭhiyaṁ sugayāṇugayaṁ ca mayalaṁchaṇamaṁḍalaṁ va ānaṁdiyaṁjaṇaṁ jayapāyaḍaṁ ca, sālāhaṇagāhākō sasatthaṁ va sarasajaṇa-manōharaṁ sālaṁkāraṁ ca sugayavayaṇaṁ va karuṇāṇu gayaṁ dhammakittisaṇāhaṁ ca, dasarahabhavaṇaṁ va rāmāṇurāyaraṁjiyaṁ lakkhaṇāṇugayaṁ ca, ahivaisarūvaṁ va mahābhōgasāraṁ suppaiṭṭiyadharaṇimaṁḍalaṁ va khiipaiṭṭiyaṁ nāma nayaraṁ ।
ēkkō cciya para dōsō aha tammi purammi guṇasamiddhammi
jaṁ vasai sayākālaṁ paradukkhē dukkhiō lōō
tatthatthi vijiyapaḍivakkha pakkha-saṁgijjamāṇaguṇa-niyarō
nāmēṇa amarasēṇō rāyā jayapāyaḍapayāvō
tattha ṇaṁ nayarē ēkkō vi bahupariyaṇāṇugaō, niggayaguṇō vi bahuguṇālaṁkiō, paramahēlāsattō vi apāradāriō, atilōyaṇō vi saṁkarō, dūruṣṇaō vi guruyaṇapaṇaō, amayalaṁchaṇō vi caṁdajasō; tahā jalanihī guṇarayaṇāṇaṁ, kulabhavaṇaṁ sayalasaṁpayāṇaṁ, kappapāyavō sayaṇajaṇa- sauṇāṇaṁ, kulasēlō kittisariyāṇaṁ, kusalō sayala- lōyavavahārāṇaṁ, viyakkhaṇō dēsa- kālakāyavvāṇaṁ, vajjapaṁjaraṁ saraṇāgayajaṇāṇaṁ; jassa ṇaṁ aṇavarayadēva -guru- dīna-duhiyaniyadavvaviyaraṇēṇaṁ riddhīṇaṁ sahalattaṇaṁ, sayala - janasamucipatthasaṁpayāṇēṇa jasavitthāraṁ, viṇayārihaviṇaya karaṇēṇa mahākulasaṁbhavaṁ sarīragayasirivacchāilakkhaṇāva- lōyaṇēṇa sayatthasaṁpatti, viusajaṇasaṁsaggīē suya-saṁpayaṁ, guṇāṇurāgēṇa amacharittaṇaṁ, muṇijaṇasussusāē dhammapaḍivata, citiyamētakajjasaṁpattīē puṇṇapabbhāraṁ aṇukūla - divvadaṁsaṇēṇaṁ jammaṁtarasukayaṁ vihalajaṇa samuddharaṇēṇaṁ mahāṇubhāvattaṇaṁ, sama- sattamittaṇēṇa majjhatthabhāvaṁ viusāvayaṁti; jō ya mūō aliyapayaṁpaṇēsu, paṁgulō paradavvāvaharaṇēsu, aṁdhō paradōsadaṁsaṇēsu, luddhō guṇarayaṇāvajjaṇēsu, citāurō satthatthēsu, dhaṇau vva aparimiyadhaṇō dhaṇō nāma satthāhō 1 parivasai ।
kiṁbahuṇā bhaṇiēṇaṁ ? dhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇasatthavāha - dēhammi
rayaṇāyarē vva rayaṇāṇa natthi aṁtō guṇagaṇāṇaṁ
tassa ṇaṁ dhaṇassa kitti vva mahāmuṇiṇō, juṇha vva sasiṇō, lacchi vva dāṇavāriṇō, mayalēha vva kariṇō, khaṁti vva khamiṇō, sai vva hariṇō, buddhi va suraguruṇō, laliya vva tiurāriṇō, paha vva raviṇōṁ, puhai vva bharahavaiṇō, kaṁti vva maṇiṇō rai vva kusumēsuṇō, kusumasamiddhi vva surataruṇō, cūla vva sura- giriṇō, karuṇa vva muṇivaiṇō, kaha vva guṇaḍḍhakaiṇō, sīya vva dāsarahiṇō, niyaguṇagaṇadha valiyadha rāmaṁḍalāsayalajaṇamaṇōhāriyā dhaṇavatī nāma bhāriyā ।

ēvaṁ citiūṇa appagāsiya paramatthā nihayā caiva ṭhiyā, kaō ṇhāṇabhōyaṇāiō uvayārō, na vhāyā, darabhuttaṁ kāūṇa uṭṭhiyā, bhattāra- dukkha dukkhiyā ciṁtā-sōyasāya ragayā uṇhanīsāsānaladaḍḍha muhacchāyā abhikkhaṇaṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ rūyamāṇī rayaṇīsu vi aladdhaniddā kālaṁ gamēṛa । iō ya nisuyaṁ sīladhaṇāē jaṇaṇi jaṇaēhi jahā kila jāmāuō vacchā sīladhaṇā ya na satthē nāvi niyadharē na najjaṁti kiṁ pi avatthaṁ ramuvagayāṇi । taō paramadukkhamuvagaēṇa jāmāuyassa dhūyāē ya maggaṇāhēuṁ savvadisāmu- hēsu visajjiyā paccaiyapurisā । ēgō ya puṇa sēṭṭhiṇō paramapaccayatthāṇaṁ sayā sannihiō vidiṇṇaviulasaṁbalō visajjiō harippō nāma māhaṇō, bhaṇiō ya -- "vayaṁsa! vaccāhi nāṇāvihēsu dēsaṁtarēsu niuṇaṁ gavēsamāṇō mama jāmāuyassa dhūyāē ya udaṁtaṁ lahāhi jīvaṁti mayāṇi vā, siddhayattō paḍiniyattāhi jāva mē pāṇā na vaccati' । 'ēvaṁ karēmi tti bhaṇiūṇa caliō harippahō । bhaṇiō rayaṇappahāē -- “ visālasāla - uramajjhēṇa rayaṇasuṁdarīē imaṁ va (i) yaraṁ sāhitēṇa gaṁtavvaṁ, māsā vihipa patiṁ labhējjā । ' ēvaṁ karissāmi' tti payaṁpiūṇa payaṭṭō pattō visālasālaṁ rayaṇasuṁdarī maṁdiraṁ ca । kayasamu- ciōvayārēṇa sāhiō savvō vi jahatthavaiyarō harippahamāhaṇēṇa niyayāgamaṇapaōyaṇaṁ ca । taō gayā diyavarēṇa saha uvari- bhūmiyāē rayaṇasuṁdarī diṭṭhā mahājōgiṇi vva ahōmuhī ki pi jhāyaṁtī sisiradaḍḍha kamaliṇi vva vivaṇṇamuhapaṁkayā sīlaghaṇā । uṣṇamiūṇa muha-kamalaṁ niyakarēṇa sōvālaṁbhaṁ bhaṇiyā rayaṇa suṁdarīē sīladhaṇā" ahō ! tē ni rayā jēṇa bahusō pucchiyā vina sabbhāvamuvagayā, saṁpayaṁ tuh pauttinimittaṁ ammā-piyarēhi pēsiō rayaṇapurāō samāgaō harippahō nāma ēsa māhaṇō ।' tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " diyavara ! kusalaṁ mē jaṇaṇi jaṇayāṇa ?" vippēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ "kusalaṁ, paraṁ ēttiēṇā kusalaṁ jaṁ tujjha jāmauyassa ya muha - kamalaṁ na pēcchati ।" rayaṇasuṁdarīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "vacchē ! muṁca vēṇī baṁdhaṁ, karēsu majjaṇaṁ ।" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ-- --

jugāijiṇida-cariyaṁ nāūṇa nicchyaṁ mōṇamā siyā rayaṇasuṁdarī । sōhaṇadiṇē bahupariyaṇē harippahēṇa samaṁ pēsiyā piugharaṁ sīladhaṇā । parimiya vāsarēhi pattāṇi rayaṇapuraṁ, ṭhiyāṇi bāhirujjāṇē, samā gayā tatthēva jaṇaṇi jaṇayā, nivaḍiyā calaṇēsu sīladhaṇā, gāḍhamāliṁgiūṇa sadukkha ruyamāṇā bhaṇiyā rayaṇappahāē - "vacchē ! kō ēsa vaiyarō ?" tīē vi sāhiō saṁkhēvēṇa savvō vi jahaṭṭiō vr̥ttaṁtō । taṁ ca sōūṇa paruṇṇā rayaṇappahā - "hā puttiya ! mahaṁtayāṇi ēgāgiṇīē dukkhāṇi samaṇubhūyāṇi । 'paōsē pavēsasamaō' tti tatthēva ya bhuṁjāviyāṇi । bhuttuttaraṁ suha daha saṁkahāē miliya ṇi jāva ciṭṭhēti tāvā gaō piṭṭhiviṇiggayagaruya kauhō, muha- vivaramaikkatavisamadasaṇō, kōilakālacchavī, vāmakaragahiyakōdaṁḍō, dāhiṇakara kayakaraṁḍō tammi ṭhāṇē ēgō purisō । harippaṇa bhaṇiō “bhō ! dīhaddhāṇaparikhēiyasarīrō viya lakkhīyasi ?” purisēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ --- āmaṁ, kahēsu vippa ! kiṁ nāmadhēya- mimaṁ nayaraṁ ? vimūḍha disa। yakkō aladdhalakkhō haṁ pariyaḍāmi ।" diēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ rayaṇapuraṁ । " rayaṇa pahāē bhaṇiyaṁ - “pahiya ! pucchijjasi, diṭṭhō taē kahiṁ pi paḍhamajōvvaṇē vaṭṭamāṇō uttatta-kaṇayavaṇṇō ruvāiguṇagaṇaviṇijjiyamayaraddhaō paramēsarō tti nāmaṁ vahaṁtō ēgō purisō ? " tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “diṭṭhō ।” tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- " kahi ? " tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " ētthēva । । ēyaṁ suṇiya vēḍhiō paripētēsu sayala pariyaṇēṇa । tēṇa vi ugghāḍiūṇa nirūviō karaṁḍō, diṭṭhā vaulāvalī ēgāvalī billaṁ kuṁḍala-juyalaṁ kaviṭṭaṁ ca dēvadūsajuyalaṁ jāyaṁ ti । taō saṁjāyapaccaēṇa gahiyā guliyā karaṁḍyāō, pakkhittā muhē, jāō sarūvatthō paramēsarō, vimhiō pariyaṇō, parōpparaṁ muhāṇi jōiuṁ payattō । rayaṇappahāē bhaṇiyā sīladhaṇā--" vacchē ! vinnāyavr̥ttaṁtā tumaṁ caiva pucchāhi, kimidayālamēyaṁ ? kiṁvā sō caiva tē hiyavallahō ?" sīladhaṇāē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "jai ēvaṁ saccaṁ sō cēva tumaṁ tā kahēsu niyavaiyaraṁ " tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - ' paccūsē gamissāmi' tti bhaṇiūṇa suttāṇi ēyaṁ tujjha vi samakkhaṁ, viuddhō puṇa pēcchāmi attāṇayaṁ suddha- silāyalagayaṁ citiuṁ ca pavattō- 'haṁta ! na taṁ jakkhāyayaṇaṁ, na sō piyākarakamalapatthariō sattharō, sivā - saddasaṁtaṭṭa- sāvayasamāulā dhūyaḍaghōkkāravabhīsaṇā niraṁtaraṁ taruniyara niruddha ravi - karappavēsā mahāḍavī ēsā taō haṁ " jai saccaṁ sīla- dhaṇā" iccāi lihiūṇa gāhādugaṁ caliō dakkhiṇābhihō । thēvaṁtaragaēṇaṁ richiyāē kanēsu gahiyāē diṭṭhō ēgō thēra- purisō । sō vi maṁ daṭṭhaṇa bhaṇiyāiō -- " mahābhāga ! sattha-bhaṭṭhō mahāḍavīṁ paviṭṭhō iō taō paribhamaṁtō kālara- tī vivadiṭṭhō imāē richiyāē, pahāviyā mamābhimuhī, saṁpayaṁ kāla - kavaliyaṁ pi mamaṁ kavaliukāmā gāḍhamaivakamai ēsā richiyā, tā jai tē sāhasaṁ parōvayārabuddhī vā atthi tā mamaṁ mōēsu ।" ahaṁ pi karuṇābharabhariyamāṇasō gaō tayaṁtiyaṁ -- kaha kaha vi mōyāviō thērō, tāsiyā richiyā caliyā dō vi dakkhiṇāhuttaṁ, vīsamiyā ēgammi varṇāniguṁjē, samāgayā mē niddā, udviō thērō, pamhuṭṭha savvaō mē sarīraṁ dōhi vi karēhi । 'ā kimēyaṁ' ti uṭṭiōhaṁ jāva pēcchāmi attāṇayaṁ ēgapāēṇa maṁṭha ēgahatthēṇa kuṁṭa paṭṭhīē kuḍahaṁ uyarē tuṁdilaṁ ēganayaṇēṇa kāṇaṁ nāsiyā ē civiḍaṁ dasaṇēha daṁturaṁ kaṇṇēhiṁ ṭapparaṁ । taṁ ca kaṇayāvadāyasarīrayaṁ kālaparusacchavi huṁḍasaṁṭhāṇaṁ bahusaṁṭhāṇaṁ jāyaṁ । sō vi thērō samāsaṇṇapaēsaḍiō maē bhaṇiō -- " sāhu bhō pariṇayapurisa ! mahaṁtō tē mama paccuvayārō kaō, jahā paṁcāṇaṇēṇa vējjaputtassa । thērēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "ki kayaṁ tēṇa tassa ? " maē bhaṇiyaṁ suṇa । , vējjaputtakahā ṇayaṁ- -- dō vējjaputtayā vējjayamahijjiūṁ dēsaṁtaraṁ gayā । kayakajjā paḍiniyattā mahāvi paviṭṭhā! maggāsapaṇē paḍalaṁtariya - lōyaṇō iō taō pariyaḍaṁtō diṭhō tēhi paṁcāṇaṇō । bhaṇiō kaṇiṭṭēṇa jēṭhō - "sajjhō ēsa vāhī, kīrau imassa vējjayaṁ, ēvaṁ hi parōvayārō kaō havai ।" jēṭṭhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ-- alamimāē saṁkahāē, aha vāriō vina viramasi tā jaṁ tē rōyai taṁ karēsu -- "tti bhaṇiya samārūḍhī vaḍapāyavē jēṭṭhī । iyarēṇa vi kayaṁ vējjayaṁ, jāō, sacakkhō, sīhō, chuhiēṇa paḍhamaṁ sō cēva khaiō । tā sīhēṇēva vējjasūyassa uvayariyaṁ majjha vi bhavayā । " thērēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ --" asaṁtuṭṭhī tumaṁ । mayā puṇa mahaṁtō uvayārō kaō ।" ēvaṁ payaṁpiya pariyattiyatrō divvāharaṇa- bhāsurasarīrō dhaṇamittasarisō surō jāō, bhaṇai ya -- " putta ! ahaṁ tē piyā vasaṇavaḍiyaṁ tumaṁ daṭṭhūṇa ihāgaō citēmi-- " ēsa aīva ruvāiguṇagaṇasamanniō mā kuō vi āvayaṁ pāuṇējjatti kaliūṇa vihiya thērarūvēṇa ēvaṁ kurūō kaō,
tavē tavatēakumāra-kahā 19 tuha gharaṇī vi asaṇāidāṇēṇa vasaṇasamuddāō maē cēva nitthāriyā, tā gēvha imaṁ karaṁḍayaṁ, imassa majjhē baulamāliyā billaṁ kaviṭṭhē ca guliyā ya ciṭṭhai, jattha gayassa baulamāliyā ēgāvalī havai kaviṭṭhāō dēvadūtajuyalaṁ । billāō kuṁḍalajuyalaṁ ca nīharai tammi cēva ṭhāṇē karaṁḍayāō kaḍḍhiūṇa guliyaṁ muhē karējjasu taō sāhāviya sarūvō hōhisi, bhaṇa saṁpayaṁ kahi na yāmi ? ।" ēyāvasarē kattō vi samāgaēṇa māṇavajakkhēṇa sahasamāvaḍiyaṁ juddhaṁ tāyassa । ahaṁ pi kaha kaha vi ghiūṇa mahāḍavi hiṁḍiūṇāṇēgēsu gāmāgara - khēḍa - kabbaḍēsu vimūḍhadisāyakkō ajjēha samāgaō pucchiō tumha paramēsaravuttataṁ । taō saṁjāyasaṁkēṇa nirūviō karaṁḍaō, jāyā baulamāliyā ēgāvalī, kaviṭṭha dēvadūsajuyalaṁ villaṁ kuṁḍala juyalaṁ kaḍḍhiūṇa karaṁḍayāō kayā muhē guḍiyā, jāō sāhāviyasarūvō, ēsa mē vaiyarō । saṁpayaṁ "suṁdari ! sāhēsu niyaya- vaiyaraṁ" । tīē vi sāhiō savittharō savyō vi niyayavaiyarō । tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- " nāha ! sīlaṁ sīlējjasu" tti silālihiya vayaṇassa kō bhāvatthō ? ।" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ, piē! "sarūvakahaṇamēyaṁ, na aṇṇahā viyappiyavvaṁ । taō savisēsaṁ saṁtumaṇāē bhaṇiyā jaṇaṇī sīladhaṇāē - - " ammō ! nissaṁsayaṁ sō cēvēsa maha piyayamō ēvaṁ suṇiya- paramānaṁdabharanibbharēhiṁ paōsasamaē pavēsiyāṇi niyamaṁdirē, kayaṁ baddhāvaṇayaṁ, vēṇīmōkkhaṁ kāūṇa vhāyā sīladhaṇā, niyaṁ- sāviyā jaṇaṇīē dhavalaṁsuyajuyalaṁ, piṇaddhaṁ kaṁdharāē vijjā haradiṇṇahārajuyalaṁ, rayaṇāvalī daiya diṇṇā ēgāvalī ya । paramēsarēṇa vi dēva diṇṇaṁ niyatthaṁ dēvadūtajuyalaṁ kuṁḍalajuyalaṁ ca । ṭhiyāṇi paramapamōēṇa tatthēva kaivaya diṇāṇi । bahuvidattadhaṇā puvvapēsiyā miliyā tatthēva satthiyā । pasatthavāsarē mahayā satthavimaddēṇa gayāṇi niyanayarē, ānaṁdiyā suhi-sayaṇā, kayāō jiṇāyayaṇēsu aṭṭhāhiyā mahimāō, sammāṇiyā samuciyōvayārēṇa sāhuṇō, vivihavisaya- suhamaṇubhavaṁtāṇa caṁda-sūrasumiṇasuiyā jāyā dōnni kula-naṁdaṇā rayaṇāvalisumiṇasuīyā jāyā ēgā suyā ya samuciya samaē paṭṭāviyāṇi nāmāṇi sumiṇāṇusārēṇa caṁdappahō sūrappahō ya duhiyāē rayaṇāvalī । kayapāṇiggahaṇēsu kulanaṁdaṇēsu, samuciyavaramuvāgayāē rayaṇāvalīē, viṇijōiūṇa supattēsu niyadhaṇaṁ, mahāvibhūīē nikkhatō saha sīlavaṇa ( ē paramēsarō । ahijjiyāṇi cōṭsapuvvāṇi, jāō gīyatthō । sīladhaṇāē vi saṁjaīṇa samīvē paḍhiyāṇi ēkkārasaṁgāṇi । paripāliūṇa niraiyāraṁ sāmanaṁ, uppāḍiūṇa kēvalavaranāṇadaṁsaṇaṁ, kāūṇa māsamēgaṁ aṇasaṇaṁ niruddhajōgāṇi nēvvāṇamuvagayāṇi ।

" kēvaliṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - " sōma ! suṇa,
atthi iva bhārahē vāsē saṁgamō nāma gāmō । sōmō nāma kulaputtaō tattha parivasai । sō puṇa payaīē cēva lōddhipiō । aṇṇayā tēṇa lōddhi kuṇaṁtēṇa kāmamōhiō piyayamāē cāḍūṇi kuṇatō āyannamāyaḍḍhiūṇa dhaṇuharaṁ hariṇīē samaṁ saṁbaddhō vāvāiō hariṇa - juvā । tappaccayaṁ aṇēgabhavavēyaṇīyaṁ baddhaṁ bhōgaṁtarāiyaṁ kammaṁ । akayatavacaraṇō āṇālōiya- paḍikkatō kāūṇa kiṁci kusalāṇuṭṭhāṇaṁ samuppannō ēsa tē puttō । ajjavi tassa kammuṇō vi dūaṇubhūō, sa muddō ciṭṭhas | tavatēēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " bhayavaṁ ! hōjja kōi uvāō jēṇa lahuṁ cēva khavijjai ? " kēvaliṇa। bhaṇiyaṁ -- " savvasāvajjavirai- rūvāē jiṇadikhāē khavijjai, sā puṇa accaṁtadullahā । jaō - " jalanihipaṇaṭṭharayaṇaṁ piva dullahaṁ māṇusattaṇaṁ, laddhē vi tammi na sulabhā āriyakhēttasaṁpayā, pattāē vi tīē accaṁtadullahāṇi jāi - kula-ruvārōgga-dhammasavaṇa- saddahaṇāṇi; kiṁ ca — dāruṇā narayā, bahudukkhāṇugayā tiriyā, niṁdiyaṁ kumāṇusattaṇaṁ īsā visāya-cavaṇabhayā isamabhibhūyā tiyasā, samucchalaṁti vāhiṇō, siraṁ samāruhai paliyacchalēṇa jarārakkhasī, āsannī hōi maccū, dujjayā kōhāiṇō, caṁcalā iṁdiyaturaṁgamā, asaraṇā pāṇiṇō, saṁsārābhinaṁdī abuhajaṇō, duraṁtō vammahō, vivāgadāruṇō māō, girinaipurasanihaṁ jōbvarṇa, karikaṇṇa- caṁcalāō rūya-lāyanna-sōhagga- piyabaṁdhu mitta-sayaṇa - gēha-dhaṇa dhaṇṇa-rayaṇa-suvaṇṇāiyāō sayalariddhīō । avi ya- ,

tā kimēttha bahuṇā ? paḍivajjaha nāraya- tiriya-narāmarabhavajalahijāṇavattabhūyaṁ siva- sumahātaruvaraphalāvaṁjhabīyaṁ mahāpurisasēviyaṁ samaṇadhammaṁ ti harisabharanibbharaṁgō dhammakahaṁ suṇiya bhaddakēvaliṇō । tavatēō tattatavē kāūṇa maṇaṁ imaṁ bhaṇai bhayavaṁ ! niviṣṇō haṁ caugaisaṁsāratikkhadukkhāṇaṁ । imiṇā puṇa dēhēṇaṁ dōhaggagaēṇa savisēsaṁ । ॥277॥ ॥278॥ aō kuṇasu mē aṇuggahaṁ savvasāvajjajōgavirai lakkhaṇāē jiṇadikkhāē । 'bhadda ! jōgō tumaṁ' ti bhaṇiūṇa dikkhiō kēvalinā । tēṇa vi paḍivannōṁ paḍhamadiṇē caiva dukkaratava caraṇābhiggahō -- bhayavaṁ ! "jāvajjīvaṁ pi maē jahaṇēṇa vi chaṭṭāi tavōkammaṁ kāyavvaṁ । tēhēva karēi । aṇṇayā māsakhamaṇaṁ karēi savvakāmaguṇiyaṁ pārēi, ēvaṁ dumāsakhamaṇaṁ ( karēi) savvakāmaguṇiyaṁ pārēi, ēvaṁ ti- cau-paṁca-chammāsakhamaṇaṁ karēi savvakāmaguṇiyaṁ pārēi, puṇō vi chammāsiyaṁ karēi savvakāmaguṇiyaṁ pārēi, ēvaṁ paṁcacautiṣṇi duṇṇiēga māsiyaṁ savvakāmaguṇiyaṁ, ēvaṁ jahāvaḍiō tahēva paḍiniyattai, ēsā paḍhamaparivā ḍībīyaparivāḍīē māsaṁ khaviūṇa vigaivajjaṁ pārēi, dumāsaṁ khavai vigaivajjaṁ pārēi, ēvaṁ timāsa - caumāsa-paṁcamāsa jāva chammāsē, pāraṇanē savvattha nivvīyaṁ, taō chammāsaṁ khavēi vigayavajjaṁ pārēi, taō paṁca- cau- tiṇṇi- duṇṇi ēgamāsaṁ pāraṇagē vigaivajjaṁ । taiyaparivāḍīē māsaṁ khavēi āyaṁbilēṇa pārēi, ēvaṁ dō tiṣṇi cau paṁca jāva chammāsē pāraṇagē āyaṁbilaṁ, puṇō vi chammāsā khavēḍa āyaṁbilēṇa pārēi, ēvaṁ paṁca cattāri tiṣṇi dōṇi ēgamāsē pāraṇagē āyaṁbilaṁ । taō cautthaparivāḍīē māsaṁ khavēi alēvāḍaṁ pārēi, ēvaṁ dō tiṇi cattāri paṁca jāva chammāsā karēi alēvārḍa pārēi, puṇō vi chammāsaṁ karēi alēvāḍa pārēi, ēvaṁ jahāvaḍiō tahēva paḍiniyattō jāva māsaṁ kāūṇa alēvāḍaṁ pārē । ēvamāha nāṇāvihaṁ gamapaccāgayaṁ tavō- kammaṁ kāūṇa saṁlēhaṇaṁ karēi ।

jō ya mayarakēū kāmiṇīṇaṁ, kappapāyavō paṇayāṇaṁ, ciṁtāmaṇī jaṇamaṇōrahāṇaṁ, dāvānalō sattukāṇaṇāṇaṁ, jalaharō suhisihikulāṇaṁ, laggaṇakhaṁbhō samassiyāṇaṁ, pahāṇasēlō kittisariyāṇaṁ, kulamaṁdiraṁ guṇagaṇakannayāṇaṁ । tassa ya rāiṇō sayalaṁtēurappahāṇā vasaṁtasuṁdarī nāma bhāriyā । tīsē kucchīē mahāsumiṇasūiō tavatēyadēvō caviūṇa puttattāē samuppannō । uciyasamaē paṭṭhāviyaṁ nāmaṁ dēvadiṇṇō । vaḍhiō kamēṇa samappiō lēhāyariyassa, acirēṇa jāō bāhattarikalā- viyakkhaṇō । tassa ṇaṁ saha paṁsukīliō, samaṁ cēva gahiyakalākalāvō mahārahō nāma rahakāradāraō paramavayaṁsō । nāṇā- vihakīlāhi kīlamāṇāṇa vaccaṁti vāsarā । , annayā kīliyāpaōgēṇa nahaṁgaṇagāmī ghaḍiō rahakāradāraēṇaṁ garuḍō । samārūḍhā dō vi rāyasuya - rahakāranaṁdaṇā । gaō nahaṇa garuḍō । niyaṁttiukāmēhiṁ saccaviyā niyattaṇakīliyā, na diṭṭhā । taō dūraṁ gaṁtūṇa bhaggapakkhō niviḍiō mahādahassōvariṁ tariūṇa bāhāhi tīraṁ gayā । bhaṇiō rahayārēṇa rāyasuō -- " kumara ! sunnārannamēyaṁ tā gammau puvvābhimuhaṁ । ' ēvaṁ ' ti bhaṇiūṇa caliō kumarō । thēvaṁtaragaēhi diṭhṭhē payaḍasaṁkha - sutti-muttā-pavāla - maragaya-maṇi- cāmīyara- cuṇṇavāluyāniya rasaṇāhēhiṁ aidīharēhiṁ sāgarasalilēhiṁ ca viviṇipaṁthēhi virāiyaṁ, surā - sura-siddha-gaṁdhavvavijjāhara- mahōragasēviyāhi vicittajiṇabhavaṇa-mālāhi alaṁkiyaṁ, jōvvaṇamayamattajuvaithaṇa - kalasa - kuṁkumāruṇasalilāē sarasariyāē parigayaṁ, sirippahaṁ nāma nayaraṁ । tattha ya sirisēṇōṁ nāma rāyā piyadaṁsaṇā nāma tassa paṭṭa - mahādēvī, tīsē niyajīviyāō vi abbhahiyā vasaṁtasirī nāma dāriyā । jāya jiṇai kēsapāsavirayaṇāē barahiṇakalāvaṁ, muhasōhāē paḍipuṇṇapuṇṇimāyaṁda, yahi visatr̥kaṁdōṭṭāī, viphuriyāharasōhāē vimakisalayāī visuddha dasaṇakaṁtīē mayalaṁchaṇakiraṇajālāī, hasiya pahā - vicchaḍḍēhi viyasiyakumuyāī, bāhulayājuvalaēṇa kōmalamuṇālāī aggahatthēhi kaṁkēllipallavē, aitaṇuyamajjhabhāgēṇa kulisa- majjha, vitthaṇṇaniyaṁbābhōēṇa gaṁgāpuliṇaṁ, ūrujuyalēṇa pīṇa thōrōrukarikaraṁ, calaṇapaṁkaēhi kummapaṭṭha, vimalanahamaṇimaūhēhi sasimaṇikiraṇajālāī, jaṁpiēṇa kaṇirakalakaṁṭhīviruyāī, gamaṇēṇa mattakāriṇāhavilasiyāī, palōiēṇa bhayauttaṭṭhavaṇa- kuraṁgīlōyaṇāṇi rūvasōhaggāiguṇagaṇasamudaēṇa mayaṇaghariṇi tti । avi ya-- --

" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - " akahaṇijjamēyaṁ tahā vi sāmisālasuyassa parahiyakaraṇapavaṇamāṇasassa paradukkhaduvikhayassa paṛipuṇṇa- puṇṇōdaēṇa diṭṭhigōyaraṁ gayassa tuha kahijjai । vārijjaṁtō vi piuṇāhaṁ bahuyaṁ daviṇajāyaṁ gahāya mahayā satthēṇa atthō- vajjaṇanimittaṁ ēttha samāgaō, āvāsiumāḍhattō nayarabāhiriyāē satthō । raṁdhaṇidhaṇa - jalā haraṇasamāulē satthajaṇē pari- miyaparivārō maṁḍavatalē niviṭṭhō haṁ jāva ciṭṭhāmi tāvāgayā kaivayadāsacēḍiyāhiṁ parivāriyā paḍhamajōvvaṇē vaṭṭamāṇā aṁgavaddhaṇanaravaiṇō sammayā mayaṇamaṁjarī nāma piṁṛavāsavilāsiṇī, nisaṇṇā daṁsiyāsaṇē । kayasammāṇā taṁbōlāiṇā khaṇamētta- macchiūṇa alakkhiyaṁ cēva pakkhittamimīē niyanāmaṁkiyaṁ muddārayaṇaṁ amhāṇa maṁjūsāē । bhaṇiōhamaṇāē - "satthavāhasya ! khaṇamēgaṁ gammau amhāṇa maṁdirē ।" uvarōhasīlayāē paḍivannaṁ maē tavvayaṇaṁ । gaō tattha kaivayasahāyasahiō । kayā tīē calaṇasōyāiyā samuciyā savvā vi paḍivattī, nimaṁtiō bhōyaṇēṇa na paḍivaṇṇaṁ maē, samāgaō niya satthaṁ । ētyaṁtarē kaō tīē aliyakōlāhalō, samāgayā daṁḍavāsiyā, pucchiyā tēhi 'kimēyaṁ' ti । tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " samāgaō maha gharē dēsaṁtarāgaya- satthavāhadāraō, sō maha hatthāō muddārayaṇaṁ gahāya akahitō cēva gaō ।" nīyā ārakkhiēṇa naravaisamīvaṁ mayaṇamaṁjarī । pucchiyā rāiṇā - " bhaddē ! kō ēsa vr̥ttaṁtō' ? tīē " bhaṇiyaṁ "mahārāya ! satthavāhavēsadhāriṇā takkarēṇa mē muddārayaṇaṁ muṭṭha ।" taṁ suṇiya samāiṭṭhō raṇṇā nayarārakkhiō - " rē ! lahuṁ taṁ satthavāhadārayaṁ ghēttaṇāgacchāhi ।" tēṇa vi tahēva 1. ēttha vaiyarō PĀ ।

।” tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " satthavāhamisēṇa kō vi mē muddārayaṇaṁ gahāya gaō ।" rāiṇā Ratana bhaṇiō talavarō -- " arē ! ērisī tē nayararakkhā, turiyamāṇēsu taṁ satthavāhatakkaraṁ । "tēṇa vi lahaṁ cēva āṇiō । rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ "satyavāha ! ki nimittaṁ taē imīē muddārayaṇaṁ hariyaṁ ?" satthavāhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "saṁtaṁ pāvaṁ । " mayaṇamaṁjarīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "mahārāya ! kimannō vi kō vi cōriyaṁ kariyaṁ kahēi, visēsaō aṇēgakūḍa - kavaḍabhariō vaṇiya- jaṇō ।" satthavāhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ "āpāvē ! nagaraniddhamaṇasamā vi hōūṇa vaṇiyajāī dūsēsi ? ।" īsi hasiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ mahīvaddaṇā -- "bhō vaṇiyasuya! jai kaha vi tuha satthē imīē muddārayaṇaṁ bhavissai tā tuha kō daṁḍō ? । " tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ-- "sayala satyadaviṇassa ēsā sāmiṇī, jai puṇa imāē cēva gharē bhavissai tā imāē kō daḍō ?।" mayaṇabhaṁjarīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- " sattavēṇīsamajjiyā kaṇayakōḍī maha gharē tīē tumaṁ sāmiō ।" taō pahāṇarāyapurisasahiyā gayā satyavāhasatthaṁ, nirūviyaṁ samaṁtaō satyavāhamaṁdiraṁ, visēsēṇa avallāō, na laddhaṁ kattha vi muddārayaṇaṁ । vilakkhavayaṇā disāmaṁḍalaṁ palōyaṁtī bhaṇiyā satthavāhēṇa -- "saṁpayaṁ tē gharaṁ gammau ।" tahēva gayāṇi, iō taō nirūviūṇa thēvavēlaṁ pallaṁkamajjhāō kaḍḍhiyaṁ maisāyara- purisēṇa muddārayaṇaṁ; daṁsiyāṇi mayaṇamaṁjarīna / makkharāṇi rāyapurisāṇa । tēhi vi kahiyaṁ rāiṇō । rāiṇā vi muddāviyaṁ maṁdiraṁ, niddhāḍiyā nayarāō mayaṇamaṁjarī, diṇṇaṁ maisāyarassa mayaṇamaṁjarīmaṁdiraṁ । maisāyarō vi niyadaviṇajāyaṁ mayaṇa- maṁjarīdaviṇaṁ ca karagayaṁ kāūṇa rāyasammaō paramapamōēṇa kālaṁ gamēi । --
bhāvanāē bhavabhīrūniva - kahā 20 anayā rajjacitāyagaṁ amaccaṁ mōttūṇa maisāyarēṇa samaṁ caliō dēvadiṣṇakumārō niyadēsābhimuhaṁ । kamēṇa vahaṁtō pattō niyanayarē, āvāsiō bāhirujjāṇē, samāgaō paccōṇīē sayalasāmaggīē piyā, suhamuhuttē pavēsiō niyamaṁdirē, kaō mahāmahasavō, samādiyāṇi jaṇaṇi jaṇayāṇi, paṇayā amacca sāmaṁtāiyā, samāṇaṁdiyāō niyadaṁsaṇēṇa aṭṭhārasa vipa- gaīō, sāhiō pucchaṁtāṇa ammā-piīṇa savvō vi niyavaiyarō, tēhi vi āṇaṁdajalabharabhāriyalōyaṇēhiṁ gāḍhamāliṁgiō cuṁbiō ya muddhāṇē, pamāṇīkaō sayalapayōyaṇēsu kālaṁ gamēi । aṇṇammi dinē kaliṁgā hivēṇa niyamāmagēṇa sōhavikkamā bhihāṇēṇa rayaṇapurāō paisiō sugutō nāmāmaccaputtō samāgaō, dōvāriyasūīō paviṭṭō diṭṭhō dēvasārarāyā । bhuttāvasāṇē pucchiō āgamaṇakāraṇaṁ । tēṇa vi paṇāmapurassaraṁ bhaṇiyaṁ---"dēva ! kumāramāmagēṇa sīhavikkamēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ, " atthi mē kaṇayamālāē dēvīē duhiyā kaṇayasuṁdarī nāma, sā jai tumhāṇa sammayaṁ tā kumārassa dijjau ।” rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " kō kallāṇē virōhō ? ।” taō samāhūō jōisiō, nirūviō pariṇayaṇagamaṇavāsarō, sammāṇiūṇa pēsiō amaccasuō, pāraddhā mahayā vicchaḍḍēṇa vivāhasāmaggī । taō pasattha diṇē cauvihabalaparivāriō rayaṇapuraṁ pai caliō dēvadiṇṇakumārō, kamēṇa vahaṁtō pattō rayaṇapuraṁ । vivāhiyā mahaimahūsavēṇa kaṇayasuṁdarī, āgaō sanagaraṁ maṇuyabhavadullahaṁ visayasuhamaṇuhavaṁtassa vaccati vāsarā । aṇṇammi dinē paṁcattamuvagaō dēva- sārarāyā । mayakiccāṇi kāūṇa maṁti- sāmaṁtēhi mahāvibhūīē ahisittō mahā rāyapaē dēvadiṇṇakumārō । jammaṁtarasucariyata- vāṇubhāvēṇa apatthiyāgayāhi cēva ahamahamiyāē varijjai samunnayavaṁsasamubbhavāhi rāyakaṇṇāhiṁ । appayāsēṇēva uvaṇamaṁti vivakkhadharāhivā । jāō caurajjāhivaī rāyā । maṇuyabhavapasaṁsaṇijjaṁ visayasuhamaṇuhaṁvatassa kamēṇa jāyā cattāri puttā-- vasaṁtasirīē vasaṁtarāō, malayasirīē malayakēū, avaṁtisirīē avaṁtibaddhaṇō, kaṇayasuṁdarīē kaṇayakēū । pariṇayavaēṇa paotrajjaṁ gahiukāmēṇa dēvadinnanarāhivēṇa mahāvibhūīē ahisittō baṁgāhivattaṇē vasaṁtarāō, aṁgāhivattaṇē avaṁtivaddhaṇō, kaliṁgā hivattaṇē kaṇayakēū iyararajjē puṇa malayakēū । appaṇāvi mahāvibhūīē nikkhatō sāgarāyariyasa bhīvē, gahiya- duvihasikkhō ahigayasuttatthō vihiya vivihatava caraṇō sāmannapariyāyaṁ paripāliūṇa kayakkhāmaṇō samāhimaraṇēṇa mariūṇa ukkōsāuō accuē suravarō jāō । bhōttūṇa tattha surasuhāī cuō samāṇō mahāvidēhē vāsē kuṁḍavaddhaṇē nayarē rāyā bhavissai । ēvaṁ suhaparaṁparāē kaṛavayabhavaggahaṇēhi sijjhissa |

naraiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - " bhayavaṁ ! kahaṁ caṁdāṇaṇā kaṁṭhaṭṭiyaṁ silāputtayaṁ vahamāṇī vi na jāṇai ? " sūriṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - "suṇēu ajjō ! sahāvēṇēva siṁgārappiō itthīyaṇō । ēsā puṇa visēsēṇa tilayacōddasagēṇāharaṇēṇāhariyā pariyaḍai । annammi diṇē gharaṁgaṇa- niviṭṭhēṇa samuppannapaōyaṇēṇa bhaṇiyā ēsā tuha vayaṁsaēṇa - "piē ! silāputtayaṁ āṇēsu āsaṁghiya pēmaguṇāē bhaṇiyamaṇāē - " nāha ! nāhamēyaṁ mahābhāramuppāḍēuṁ samatyā ।” imiṇā vi āṇālaṁghaṇavilakkhēṇa āyārasaṁvaraṁ kāūṇa citiyaṁ cittēṇa -- 'tahā maē kāyavvaṁ jahēsā ēyaṁ kaṁṭhaṭṭiyaṁ vahai । pacchaṇṇamēva mūlē vidhāvēūṇa khaciō jaccasuvaṇṇēṇa, maṁḍiō paṁcavaṇṇa- mahagghamaṇīhi pōiō kaṇayamayasaṁkalēṇaṁ । aṇṇammi diṇē bhaṇiyā caṁdāṇaṇā- "piē ! tuha kaē aubvaṁ mahārihaṁ mahāmōllaṁ hīrayahī raṁtalōyalōyaṇaṁ āharaṇaṁ bhaē kārāviyaṁ, tā karēsu bhōyaṇasāmaggī, bhōyāvēsu suhisayaṇavaggaṁ jēṇa tassa puraō mahāmahasavēṇa sahatthēṇa tuha kaṁdharāē āvidhāmi ।" tīē vi akayakālakkhēvaṁ tahēva saṁpāḍiyaṁ । bhōttāyaṁtēsu vidinna- pupphataṁbōlē maṁḍavatalaniviṭṭhēsu suhisayaṇavaggēsu samāhūyā tuha mittēṇa caṁdāṇaṇā । diṇayarakaraniyarakaraṁbiyakamalaṁ va vayaṇakamalamubvahaṁtī samāgayā । piṇaddhō sahatthēṇa kaṁdharāē tuha vayaṁsaēṇaṁ silāputtaō । harisavasavisappamāṇahiyayā iō taō pariyaḍaṁtī mahimaṁḍalē vi na māi caṁdāṇaṇā । na muyai khaṇamavi kaṁdharāō । nirūviō savimhayāē savvaparisāē caṁdāṇaṇākaṁṭhaṭṭiō silāuttaō । ēvaṁ suṇiya parihariyāharaṇāhilāsā, lajjābharamaṁtharā, ahōmuhī ṭhiyā caṁdāṇaṇā । sūriṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - "ēvaṁ paramatthaō bhāramābharaṇaṁ, paraṁ siṁgārasaṁkappēṇa abhāramiva mannamāṇō jaṇō vahai ।" gīyaraiṇā citiyaṁ- ahō ! " nānihī bhayavaṁ jō pacchaṇṇakayaṁ pi payaḍamiva vavaharai ।” ētyaṁtarē aṇāyārapavattaṁ vaṇiyasuya-baṁbhaṇaduhiyā-juyalayaṁ 1. nimmāṇi pijē. । 2. maha parama0 JĒ । 3. vva paṇa na0 PĀ । 4. saraṁtī usurasuṁbhiya JĒ । 5. kēlipiya jē । kēlikilapā । 6. rā barddha pā ।
36 jugāijiṇida-cariyaṁ nayarārakkhiyapurisēhi pāviyaṁ । nivēiyaṁ gaiṇō । samāiṭṭhamaṇēṇa - "ciraṁ viḍaṁbiūṇa vikaraṇaṁ karēha । aṇṇō vi jō maha purē aṇāyārakārī sō ēvaṁ caiva kāyavvō” । taō tiṇamasivilittagattaṁ būḍarāsahārōviyaṁ, uvari dhariyachittarāyavattaṁ, avivēyajaṇa-jaṇiya-kōlāhalaṁ, paē para hammamāṇaṁ kasāipahārēhi pattaṁ ujjāṇasamāsaṇṇamasāṇasaṁṭhiyasūlāsamīvē samārō- viō sulāē vaṇiyanaṁdaṇō । vigaya ghāṇa savaṇā kayā baṁbhaṇadāriyā । jaliyajalaṇaṁ pavēsiūṇa mayā । naṭṭaraiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " bhayavaṁ ! mahaī aṇattha- paraṁparā ।" sūriṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - " bhaddamuha ! paragharavasaṇamēyaṁ । jaṁ puṇa sagharē caiva tuha basaṇaṁ taṁ pi samāsaṇṇaṁ vaṭṭai ।” naṭṭaraiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - " kahūṁ ti ।" sūriṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - "alaṁ, sayalajaṇasamakkhaṁ imāē saṁkahāē । aha tē nibbaṁdhō tō saṁpayamēva ētthēva saṁṭhiyāṇaṁ payaḍaṁ bhavissai ।" ēyaṁ suṇiya aṇakkhabharabhariyamāṇasā apaḍivaṇṇa-dhammaguṇā sagharaṁ pai patthiyā caṁdamuhī । aṁtarā diṭṭhō puvvapariciō kulaputtaō । saṁvaḍhiō paṇaō, viyaṁbhiō mayaraddhaō, paviṭṭhāṇi nayarāsannamujjāṇaṁ, payaṭṭō aṇāyārō । diṭṭhāṇi talavarēṇaṁ । daḍhaṁ kayatthiūṇa daṁsiyāṇi rāiṇō । naravaiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - " bhō kimēyaṁ ?" aliya- dhaṭṭattaṇēṇa jaṁpiyamaṇēhi - dēva ! “aliyavāī dujjaṇō jaṇō । " dharāhivēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - " kō ēttha paccaō ?" tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ - " sujjhāmō kharamuha - jakkha-puraō ।" talavarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "dēva ! jai ēyāṇi visujyaṁti muccattaṁ kaṭṭaṁ kharamuhō na jakkhō ।” rannā bhaṇiyaṁ rē ! "sujjhaṁtu, ki tuha viyārēṇa ? ।” taō paurapurajaṇa - parivāriyāṇi gayāṇi kharamuha-ujjāṇaṁ, jattha piyaṁkarāriō jaṇāṇa dhammaṁ vajjaraṁtō ciṭṭhai । kamēṇa pattāṇi jakkhāyayaṇaṁ । vihiya - jala-sōyāṇi karē kāūṇa aṭṭhaṭṭhayaṁ- pupphāṇi ṭhiyāṇi vīsahatyaṁtarē paēsē । puraō hōūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ dēvaccaēṇa - “bhō ! jō ēttha niddōsō sō niyatthavatthō gacchai, tahēva niyattai । iyarō puṇa savatthō gacchai, vivatthō balai । aō sammaṁ nirūviya suddhī kāyavvā । 'jakkhō pamāṇaṁ' ti bhaṇamāṇāṇi caliyāṇi, tāṇi pattāṇi jakkhapāyaṁtiyaṁ । pūiō aṭṭasu aṁgēsu aṭṭhapupphīē kulaputtaēṇa kharamuhō । tayaṇu caṁdamuhīē । kappō tti kaliūṇa kāūṇa paṇāmaṁ dāhiṇapāyaṁguṭṭhaē chittō kulaputtaēṇa ।

" ninnāmiē ! tuha saddā suhāsuhā । sui-pahamāgacchati ruvāṇi vi suṁdara maṁgulāṇi pāsasi, gaṁdhē suhāsuhē aghāēsi, rasēvi maṇāmaṇuṇē āsāēsi, phāsē vi iṭṭāṇiṭṭhē paḍisaṁvēdēsi, chuhāiyā jaṁ vā taṁ vā bhuṁjasi, tanhāiyā icchāē taḍāgāi- jalaṁ pibasi, tamasi jōi pagāsēṇa kajjāṇi karēsi, mahā - vāhipīḍiyāē paḍiyāraṁ pi kōi tē karējjā, rayaṇīē icchāē sayaṇaṁ pi tē sāhīṇaṁ, sīyāō unhaṁ uṇhāō vā sīyaṁ, para saṁcārō vi tē savasō, suha- dukkhamuṇitagō vi tē vijjai । jaṁ puṇa pēcchasi annāṇa puṇṇavaṁtāṇa garuya - riddhīō । mannēsi tēṇa guru- dukkha dukkhiyaṁ appayaṁ bhaddē ॥578॥

47 dhanasatthavāha-kahā dhaṇṇasatthavāha-kahā- vasaṁtapuraṁ nāma nayaraṁ । tattha ṇaṁ aparimiya-dhaṇō dhaṇō nāma satthavāhō vasaṁtapurāō nivvuipuraṁ para patthaō | ghōsaṇaṁ' karāvēi - ' jō ṇaṁ maē saha nivvuipuraṁ para payaṭṭai tassa ṇaṁ khāṇēṇa vā pāṇēṇa vā vatthēṇa vā pattēṇa vā chattēṇa vā uvāṇahaṇēṇa vā jō jēṇa atthī tassa taṁ saṁpāḍēmi । taṁ suṇiya samāgayā bahavē pāṇiṇō । taō sō tēsi piṁḍiyāṇaṁ paṁthaguṇē sāhēi - "bhō bhō lōyā ! nivvui puraṁ pai payaṭṭāṇaṁ dōnni pahā । ujjugō vaṁkō ya । tattha ṇaṁ jō sō daṁkō tatya ṇaṁ paē para payāṇi, ṭhāṇē ṭhāṇē patta - puphpha-phalamaṇōharā mahīruhā, sulahāṇi bhōyaṇāṇi suhaṁ suhēṇa gammai । paraṁparāē sō vi ujjaya-pahaṁ samōyara । aō tēṇa cirakālēṇa nivvuipuraṁ pāvijjai । jō puṇa ujjugō tēṇa lahuṁ gammai । kicchēṇa ya kahaṁ ? sō aīvavisamō saṇhō ya । tattha ōyārē cēva duvē mahāghōrā vaggha- sīhā parivasaṁti । tē tappabhiī' cēva maggaō laggaṁti amuyaṁtāṇa ya paṁthaṁ na pahavaṁti । avasāṇaṁ ca jāva aṇuvaṭṭēti । rukkhā ya ēttha ēgē manōharā । tēsi puṇa chāyāsu vi na vīsamiyanvaṁ । māraṇappiyā khu sā chāyā । parisaḍiya paṁḍu-pattāṇaṁ puṇa ahō muhuttagaṁ vīmivvaṁ ti । manōhara rūva-dhāriṇō mahura- vayaṇēṇaṁ' ēttha maggataraṭṭiyā bahavē purisā hakkārēti tēsi vayaṇaṁ na sōyavvaṁ । satthigā ya khaṇaṁ pina mōttavvā । ēgāgiṇō ya niyamā bhayaṁ duraṁtō ya ghōrō" davaggī appamattēhi 'ulhavēyavvō । aṇōlhavijjatōya niyamēṇa dahai । puṇō ya duggucca pavvaō appamattēhi' cēva laṁghēyavvō । alaṁghaṇē niyamā marijjai । " puṇō mahai ai-guvila-gavvarāvaṁsa" kuḍaṁgī sigdhaṁ laṁghēyavvā । tammiṭhiyāṇaṁ bahū dōsā । taō lahugō khaḍḍō । tassa samīvē maṇōrahō nāma baṁbhaṇō niccaṁ sannihiō acchai । sō bhaṇai - "maṇāgaṁ pūrēha ēvaṁ ti tassa vayaṇaṁ na sōyavvaṁ sō ṇa purēyavvō" sō khu pūrijmāṇō mahallatarō havai । puriḍaṁ na sakkā, paṁthāō ya bhajjijjai । phalāṇi ya ēttha divvāṇi paṁcappayārāṇi nētāsurā । gāṇaṁ na pēkkhiyavvāṇi na vā bhōktavvāṇi । bāvīsaṁ ca ṇaṁ ēttha ghōrā mahākarālā pisāyā । khaṇaṁ khaṇamabhiddavāṁta tē viṇaṁ na gaṇēyavvā । bhattapāṇaṁ ca ēttha vibhāgaō virasaṁ dullahaṁ ca tti, uppayāṇagaṁ caiva na kāyavvaṁ aṇavarayaṁ ca gaṁtavvaṁ rattīē vi dō cēva jāmāsu viyavvaṁ sēsa dugē gaṁtavvamēva । ēvaṁ ca gacchaṁtēhi dēvāṇuppiyā ! khippāmēva aḍavī laṁghijjai । laṁghittā ya tamēgaṁtadōgaccavajjayaṁ pasatthasivapuraṁ pāvijjai । jattha ṇaṁ na jarā na maccū na ya iṭṭhaviōgō. nāṇiṭṭhasaṁpaōgō, na vā kēi kilēsa tti । taō tattha kēi tēṇa samaṁ payaṭṭā jē ujjugēṇa gaṁtu-maṇā । annē puṇa iyarēṇa pahā viyā । taō sō patthē divasē uccaliō । puraō vaccaṁtō maggaṁ āhaṇai, silāisu ya paṁthassa dōsaguṇa-pisuṇagāṇi akkha- rāṇi lihai । ēttiyaṁ gayaṁ ēttiyaṁ sēsaṁ ti vibhāsā । ēvaṁ jē tassa niddēsē vaṭṭiyā tē tēṇa samaṁ acirēṇa taṁ puraṁ pattā । jē vi lihiyāṇusārēṇa sammaṁ gacchati tē vi pāviti । jē na vaṭṭiyā na vā varddhiti sīyalachāyāisu paḍisēviṇō tē na pattā na na yā vi pāviti ēyaṁ davvapahanāyaṁ । saṁpayaṁ bhāvapahanāē jōijjai । satthavāhatthāṇīyā arahaṁtā । ugghōsaṇā - thāṇīyā dhammakā । taḍigāi thāṇīyā jīvā । aḍavithāṇīō saṁsārō । ujjugō sāhu maggō । vaṁkō ya sāvaya- maggō । nivvuipura- thāṇīō mōkkhō । vaggha- sīha-tullā rāgadōsā । manōhara - rukkha cchāyā - tthāṇīyāō itthīgāi- saṁsattavasahīō । parisaḍiyāi- thāṇīyāō agajajja va sahīō । magga-taḍattha- hakkāraṇa- purisatyāṇīyā pāsatthāiyā akallāṇamittagā । satthiga- tthāṇīyā sāhū । davaggāi sthāṇīyā kōhādaō kasāyā । phalatthāṇīyā visayā । pisāya - tthāṇīyā bāvīsaṁ parīsahā । bhatta-pāṇa-cira- dullaha-tthāṇīyāṇi phāsūya- ēsaṇijjāṇi । appayāga-tthāṇīō niccujjamō । rattīē vi jāmadugagamaṇa -tthāṇīō jāmadugē sajjhāō। pura- pattāṇaṁ mōkkha suhaṁ ti । ētthayaṁ taṁ puraṁ gaṁtukāmō jaṇō uvaēsadāṇāiṇā uvagārī satyavāhō tti namaṁsai । ēvaṁ mōkkhatyīhi vi bhagavaṁ paṇamiyavvō tti । ēvaṁ ninnāmiē ! kō vi kassa vi jōgō tti kaliūṇa parama- kāruṇigēhiṁ parōvayārarasiēhi titthayarēhiṁ jīvāṇaṁ nēvvuipurassa dōṇṇi pahā padasiyā ! ninnāmiyāē bhaṇiyaṁ- 1. ghōsāvaṇaṁ kāravēi PĀ । 2. tēsi satthiyāṇaṁ PĀ । 3. tē taō pāē ccēva - āvaha pū. 384 । . 4. puṇa mahē mu. jē. । 5. vayaṇā ya jē. । 6. maggataḍaṭṭiyā jē. । 7. duraṁtō thōvō dava. jē. । 8. ullavēya. āvaha pa. 0 384 9. ō uvatēhiṁ āvaha. pū. 384 । 10. marijjaṁti āvaha. pa. 384 । 11. vila biccharāyaṁ pā. । vila gahvarāyaṁjē । 12. purēhi āvaha pa. 384 । 13. na sōyavvaṁ sō ṇa pūrēyavvō āvaha. 384 ।
48 jugāijiṇiṁda-cariyaṁ " bhayavaṁ ! vaṁkapaṇa sivapuraṁ pai payaṭṭāṇaṁ kimaṇuṭṭhāṇaṁ jīvāṇaṁ ?" bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ -- “bhaddē ! paḍhamamēva duvihadhamma- kappapāyava-bīyabhūyaṁ sammattaṁ paḍivajjiyavvaṁ । micchatta- mōha - mōhiō jīvō aṁdhō vva, sakajja- sāhagō na bhavai jahā - | 1 ēgammi nagarē ēgō rāyā । tassa dō puttā bāhattari - kalā - viyakkhaṇā sūrasēṇa vīrasēṇā । tāṇa paḍhamō jammaṁdhō sadda vēhī ya । bīō puṇa sajjakkhō samaraviyakkhaṇō ya । aṇṇayā pārō tāṇa piyā sattu-naridēṇa vēḍhiyaṁ nayaraṁ । niruddhā niggama- pavēsā । vinnattō sūrasēṇēṇa rāyā-- “ tāya ! visajjēsu maṁ jēṇa parāṇīyaṁ parājiṇāmi" । visajjiō rannā । sasahāō pattō parāṇīyaṁ । jattha jattha saddaṁ suṇēi tattha tattha sāvaṇaghaṇō vva niraṁtaraṁ nārāya-dhārā-dhōraṇīhi varasiumāraddhō । iō taō visaṁṭhalaṁ 'vayaṁtō samaraṁgaṇō viyāṇiō vi pakkha-narida - jōhēhiṁ । jahēsa aṁdhō savēhī ya । taō bharaṁ kāūṇa avayaṇā cēva tadu- vari nivaḍiyā । ētyaṁtarē jaṇayāṇunnāō pavara- karivarārūḍhō samāgaō samarasasīsaṁ 'vīrasēṇa kumārō । tahā jujjhiuṁ pavattō jahāpayaṁḍa pavaṇa-paṇōlliyaṁ va mēhavaṁdaṁ disōdisi paṇaṭṭha sattubalaṁ । mōyāviō jēṭṭa-bhāyā । pattā raṇaṁgaṇē jayapaḍāyā। pasaṁsiō sayalalōēṇa । parituṭumāṇasēṇa piuṇā paiṭṭiō niyapaē। jāō sayalasōkkhāṇa bhāyaṇaṁ । tā bhaddē !

' taō tē vivayaṁ daṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ mallagaṇasāmiṇā arihamittassa - ' avassaṁ tē ajja ēttha sakuḍuṁbēṇa bhōttavvaṁ, vibhāgā gayaṁ ca daviṇaṁ dāyavvaṁ samudāyadhammō ēsa।' 'na annā gai ti mantramāṇēṇa tahiṁ cēva bhuttaṁ vibhāgāgayaṁ ca daviṇaṁ diṇṇaṁ arihami - tēṇaṁ । ēvaṁ gaṇābhiōgēṇa ditassa bhuṁjaṁtassa ya na sammattamailaṇā, 'gaṇābhiōgi 'tti bhaṇiyaṁ । saṁpayaṁ balābhiōgō bhaṇṇai । tattha udāharaṇaṁ-- arihadatta sāvayakahā- samudāyadhamma- vacchāvisa kusumasuṁdarō nāma gāmō tassa ṇaṁ gāuyaṁtariō maggāsannō mahai mahālaō vaḍapāyavō । tassa hē | mahapamāṇō ailaṁbōyarō susiramajjhō maṭṭiyāmaō aggiṇā pakkō piṭṭipaṭṭiyā lakkha vivarō sapāḍihērō jaṁbhalō nāma jakkhō parivasai । aṇṇayā gāmapahāṇēhiṁ miliūṇa kaō jakkhassa aibalō nāma dēvaccagō । bhaṇiō ya lōgēṇa- 'jamēttha taē kayaṁ taṁ tahā kayaṁ cēva ēsa tē varō' paḍivaṇṇamaṇēṇa । vaccaṁti vāsarā । aṇṇayā kusumasuṁdara - gāmavatthabvaēṇa payāvaimaya harēṇa bahulapaṁkanāmēṇa jaṁbhalajakkhaṁ pūyaṁtēṇa viyāṇiyaṁ kaha kaha vi piṭṭipaē sē vivaraṁ । vigappiyamaṇēṇa niyamaṇē 'saṁti mē dōṇārā ' vīsasahassā, tā pacchaṇṇamēva ghēttūṇa rayaṇīē jakkhōyarē nihāṇaṁ karēmi । tahēva kathaṁ । vivaraṁ ṭhaiūṇa bhayavaṁ ! surūvapaḍirūvakahā 77 tammi ya nagarē yibaṁdha kumayasaṁḍaṇisāyarō apisuṇō amaccharī kayaṇṇuō paḍhamābhibhāsī sōmadēvō nāma māhaṇō parivasaḥ । viṇijjiyaratirūvāvīyamiva abhagga - sōhagga- mahāmahīruhassa, sukhēttamiva rūva । iguṇa- gaṇasassāṇaṁ, rāyahāṇī viva mayara - kēuṇō' sayalasaṁsāra - suhaṇibaṁdhaṇā sōmā nāma māhaṇī । tīē saha visaya- suhamaṇubhavaṁtassa sōmadēvassa surūva paḍirūvābhihāṇā' jāya। dōnni dārayā । kamēṇa vaḍḍhamāṇā pattā jōvvaṇaṁ । pariṇīyā tammi cēva nagarē sakamma- ṇirayāṇa māhaṇa-kaṇṇagāṇa vaccai kālō । aṇṇayā kusauranayarāō aṇunnaviya gurūyaṇaṁ gāmāṇugāmaṁ viharatō suttattha- parikammiya- matī sayalapāvadvāṇāī pariharaṁtō samāgatō tattha vijayadhammō nāma muṇivarō । ṭhiō sōmasēṭṭhijāṇasālāē । samāgayā jāgarayā kayā muṇiṇā dhammadēsaṇā । vaṁdiūṇa muṇivaraṁ jahāgayaṁ paḍigayā parisā । kaō tatthēva muṇiṇā māsakappō । āgacchaṁti paidiṇaṁ surūva-paḍirūvagā māhaṇa - dārayā । muṇī vi kahēṁti tāṇa jiṇadhammaṁ । aṇudigaṁ dhammasavaṇa-saṁjāyasaddhēhi grahiyā muṇisamīvē ṇiravarāhabēiṁdiyāijīvāṇa saṁkappaō pāṇavaha ṇivittī । māsāvasāṇē vihariō' aṇṇattha muṇivarō । jahā paḍivaṇṇāṇuvvaya- pālaṇaṁ kuṇatāṇa vaccai kālō surūva- paḍivagaṇa | । aṇṇā maraṇa pajjavasāṇayāē jīvalōgassa uvarayāṇi jaṇaṇi jaṇayāṇi । tatō tē kāūṇa tāṇa maya - kiccāṇi ghara - kajjāṇi kāumāraddhā । puṣvakayakamma- pariṇaivasēga thōvadiṇamajjhē cēva samāgayaṁ dāliddaṁ । aṇivvahaṁtā ya gayā gāmamēgaṁ । paragharēsu kukammāṇi kuṇaṁtā kilēsēṇa udaramēttaṁ pi bharēṁti । aṇṇayā dhaṇṇābhihāṇāē - raṁḍāthērīē vissā- samāgayāē bhaṇiyā surūva paḍirūvagā -- " vacchā ! nēha maṁ kusatthalapuraṁ । tattha gayā dīṇāra- dasagaṁ vitarissāmi । paḍivaṇṇa- mahi । kayā gamaṇa - sāmaggī sārahibhāvaṁ paḍavaṇṇō surūvō । gahiyāuhō puratō ṭhitō paḍirūvagō । kamēṇa vaccaṁtā mahāvi paviṭṭhā vigaliyappā ō vāsarō sāma-vayaṇāōṁ kayāvarāhāō viva kulavadhūō jāyātō disātō । ēyammi aṁtarē bhaggō akkhō, bhaṁḍīē samāraṇakaē taduvagaraṇaṁ parāmasaṁtēṇa diṭṭhō gaṁṭhī paḍirūvagēṇa । thērīdiṭṭhī vaṁciūṇa chōḍiō । diṭṭhāō dōṇi suvaṇakhōḍiyāō' caliyacittēṇa savarṇatē hōūṇa saṇiyaṁ bhaṇiō surūvō paḍirūvagēṇa - " bhāya ! ṇimmāṇusā aḍavī, tamaṁdhayārā savvarī । atthi ēyāē thērīē suvaṇṇayaṁ । tā mārēūṇa giṇhāmō ।” surūvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "alamiyāē pāva - kahāē । ēgaṁ vaya-khaṁḍaṇaṁ, bīyaṁ itthī - vahō, taiyaṁ vissaṁbhaghāyagattaṇaṁ । mūḍhō tumaṁ jō sayamēva ṇiravarāha bēiṁdiyāijīvāṇaṁ saṁkappaō vahaṇivatti kāūṇa bhaṁjēsi ? ahō tē daḍhadhammayā ! " paḍirūvagēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ bhāya ! mōttūṇa ēvaṁ vaya- pālaṇā kūḍābhimāṇaṁ, karēsu maha vayaṇaṁ ।” surūvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ jai ēvaṁ maṁtēsi tō haṁ tuha samīvē vi na ciṭṭissaṁ ।” iyarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — “hiyāhiyaviyāra - bāhirō kuggahamahāgaha - gahiya māṇasō dūraṭṭhiō cēva tumaṁ suṁdarī ।" tatō mōttūṇa taṁ paēsaṁ dūraṁgaō surūvō । iyarō vi thēri māriūṇa gahiyahiraṇṇō aḍavīē aladdhalakkhaṁ palāyaṁtō paṁcāṇaṇēṇa paṁcattaṁ pāvitō । aṭṭajjhāṇēṇa mariūṇa samuppaṇṇō tammi cēva paēsē bhayaṁgamō । daṭṭhūṇa suvaṇṇayaṁ saṁjāyamucchō tammi cēva paēsē ahiṭṭiya ṭhiō । thērī jīvō vi tēṇa tahāmāriō, naulō jāō । tēṇa vi paribhamaṁtēṇa diṭṭhē taṁ suvaṇṇagaṁ । sō vi saṁjāya- mucchō tassa paripēraṁtēsu pariyaḍaṁtō ciṭṭhai । diṭṭhī bhuyaṁgamēṇa । pāraddhā jujjhiyaṁ māriō ṇaulēṇa bhuyaṁgamō । puṇō vi mariūṇa sappō jāō । puṇō vi lōbhadōsēṇa suvaṇṇayamabhisaraṁtō ṇaulēṇa māriō saṁtō mūsagō jāō । ṇaulō vi ahāyakkhaṇa mariūṇa tammi cēva ṭhāṇē majjārō jāō । taō sō mūsagō suvaṇṇagāsaṇṇaṁ pariyaḍaṁtō vāvāiō majjārēṇa । puṇō vi mūsagō jāō । tattha vi vāvāiō, tatō mūsagō mariūṇa tammi cēva paēsō migō jāō । majjārō vi cittō । cittagēṇa vi dō vārē vāvāitō migō saṁtō । migō mariūṇa jāō kōliya -suō । cittagō vivāha - vahiō mariūṇa tassēva lahu-bhāyā । parōpparaṁ kalahaṁtā kālaṁ garmēti । aṇṇayā dō vi gayā aḍavīē । bhatēhi diṭṭha taṁ caiva suvaṇṇayaṁ । pāradvā' jujjhiuṁ । māriō kaṇiṭṭhēṇa jiṭṭhō' jāō sūyarō । ēmāi thērīē jīvātō paḍivō dasaguṇaṁ maraṇaṁ' pāvitō । jaō-- wing 1. mayaṇakē0 PĀ । 2. paḍirūvasarūvagābhi0 PĀ । 3. viharaṁtō aṇṇa0 JĒ । 4. kukammakammāṇi PĀ । 5. sōvaṇṇā khuṭṭiyātō JĒ । 6. 0 ssēva bhāyā PĀ । 7. taṁ pāraddhā JĒ 18. jiṭṭhō ēvamā0 JĒ । 9. māraṇaṁ PĀ ।

" tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ -- "mahārāya ! sagharē cēva tassa rāiṇō jēṭṭhaputtajuvarāēṇa saha viggahō । aliyaṁ kēṇa vi dēvapāyāṇa bhayakāraṇaṁ kahiyaṁ । ēvaṁ suṇiya uttiṣṇō rāyā duggāō । samāgayā jāgarayā । pāraddhō vavahārō । viṇhū vi jaṁ dasaha gahiyaṁ taṁ saēṇa vi na dēi । ēvaṁ vavaharaṁtēṇa tēṇa saṁpiḍiyaṁ bhūridaviṇajāyaṁ । -- aṇṇammi diṇē pucchiō baṁbhaṇēṇa - - " bhāya ! kahaṁ taē ṇagarasaṁbhamē vi bhaṁḍagahaṇē sāhasamaṇuṭṭiyaṁ ?" tēṇa vi kahiyaṁ freemāyāvilasiyaṁ । iyarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "ṇa sōhaṇamēyaṁ, ēgaṁ tāva dhūlāliyavirativayakhaṁḍaṇaṁ bīyaṁ rāya viruddhaṁ ।" viṇhuṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " vayasuddhi puṇō vi gurukahaṇāiṇā karissāmi rāyaviruddhaṁ pi ṇa bhavissati । jatō na mama।ō annō kō vi ēyaṁ viyāṇai ।" iyarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " na mē imiṇā atthēṇa vi kajjaṁ, ajjēva maē tuha bhiṇṇēṇa hōyavvaṁ ! " viṇhuṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- ēgaṁ tāva ṇivvavasāō bīyaṁ bhiṇṇabhavaṇēṇa bhāēsi । bhavasu kō ṇivārēi । aliyavayaṇavidattadaviṇamagiṇhaṁtō puḍhō ṭhiō baṁbhō saccābhibhāsī susaṁtuṭṭō ka. laṁ gamēi । - iō ya pāraddhā rāiṇā mūlasuddhī । kēṇēsā paracakkā liyavattā kayā ? paraṁparaēṇa tāvagayā jāva vihū । tatō ṭhiyā bhaṇiō viṇhū rāyapurisēhi-- "bhadda ! tumaṁ pi annaṁ kahitagaṁ daṁsēhiṁ । na sō tarati aṇṇaṁ daṁsēuṁ । tatō samappitō rāiṇō । asahaṁtaēhi kahitō ṇaravaissa samagghabhaṁḍaggahaṇavaiyarō 'kukammakārī ēsō' tti saṁjāyanicchaēṇa rāiṇā pucchiō maṁtī - - " kuḍalēhakaraṇē kassa vāvārō ? " maṁtiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ dāhiṇa karassa jīhāē ya । rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " dōha vichēyaṁ karēha । tatō viḍaṁbiūṇa ṇayaramajjhē masāṇē nēūṇa viṇhuṇō dāhiṇakarō jīhā ya chiṇṇā । ruddajjhāṇēṇa mariūṇa taccapuḍhavīē raitō jāō । baṁbhō vi rāyāmaccasammatō, giraiyāraṁ dēsaviraī paripāliūṇa, jēṭṭhaputtaṁ kuḍuṁbē saṁṭhaviya, vihivihiyāṇasaṇō paṁcaṇamōkkāraparāyaṇō, mariūṇa sahassārē suravarō jātō । jugaṁdharāyariēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "ninnāmiē ! thūlamusāvāya - virativirāhaṇā duhāvahā jahā viṇhussa । ārāhaṇā puṇa suhāvahā jahā baṁbhassa । saṁpayaṁ thūlādattādāṇaviraīē ārāhaṇāvirāhaṇā ya bhaṇṇai । caṁdaṇa-naṁdaṇa kahā- — atha iva jaṁbuddīvē vē bhārahē vāsē uttuṁgapāgārapaiṭṭhiyakavi-sīsaya-paraṁparāvaruddha nahaṁgaṇābhōgaṁ, ṇāṇāvihamaṇi- rayaṇa- virāyaṁta haṭṭamaggaṁ, jahāṭhāṇaviṇivēsiyatiya- caukka-caccaraṁ, maṁdarāyamāṇajiṇabhavaṇa- siharasaṁṭhiya-pavaṇapahōlira- dhavala- dhayavaḍakaraggēhi dhammiyajaṇaṁ va hakkārayaṁtaṁ, ārāmujjāṇakāṇagavirāiyaṁ vijayavaddhaṇaṁ nāma nayaraṁ । tattha ṇaṁ caṁdaṇa-naṁdaṇa- nāmāṇō dōnni vaṇiya-dāragā paramamēttībhāvēṇa parivasaṁti । aṇṇayā ahāvihārēṇa viharaṁtā sūrō vva paṇāsiyānnāṇa- timiraṇiyarā, sōmō vva sōmadaṁsaṇā caraṇāṇa viyāṇiya vivihavatthuvittharā guṇasuṁdarābhihāṇō sūriṇō samāgayā । samōsariyā layāsuṁdarujjāṇē । samāgayā vaṁdaṇavaḍiyāē nagara- 1. ahasaṁtēhi JĒ ।

laliyaṁgaya ! rayaṇīē tīē puratō gaṁtūṇa savisēsaviuvviyasurūvaparamadaṁsaṇijjaṁ attāṇayaṁ daṁsēsu ।" bhaṇēhiṁ ya-bhō ṇiṇṇāmiē ! karēsu ērisaṁ ṇiyāṇayaṁ - 'jai imassa kusalāṇudvāṇassa ki pi phalamatthi tā ahaṁ īsāṇē kappē sirippabhē vimāṇē laliyaṁgayassa dēvassa aggamahisī saṁyaṁpabhābhihāṇā bhavējjā ।" sō vi tahēva āgatō । attāṇayaṁ daṁsiūṇa taṁ savva tī puratō bhaṇiūṇa adaṁsaṇaṁ gatō । sāvi paritōsa vasa - visappamāṇa māṇasā dēsadaṁsaṇēṇa lahējja dēvattaṁ' ti kayatthamappāṇayaṁ maṇṇēmāṇī kāūṇa ṇiyāṇaṁ kālagayā samāṇī īsāṇē kappē sirippabhē vimāṇē laliyaṁgayassa dēvassa aggamahisī sayaṁpabhā ṇāma jāyā । kaya dēvikaraṇijjā ōhiṇāṇōvaōgaviṇṇāya dēvabhavakāraṇā ya saha laliyaṁgaēṇa jugaṁdharagurūvō vaṁdiumavaiṇṇā । taṁ samayaṁ tē vi tammi cēva aṁbaratilaē maṇōramē ujjāṇē aṇṇattha vihariūṇa sagaṇā samōsarayā । tatō paramānaṁdabhara ṇibbharāē tipayāhiṇaṁ kāūṇa samaṁ laliyaṁgaēṇa vaṁdiyā sayaṁpabhāē । puvvabhavaṇiyaṇāmagōttaṁ kahēūṇa ṇaṭṭōvahārēṇa pūṛaūṇa gayā savimāṇaṁ saha laliyaṁgaēṇa । divvē ya kāmabhōē laliyaṁgasahiyā ṇiruvasaggā cirakālamaṇuhavati । aṇṇayā sō dēvō āūkkhaēṇa cuō samāṇō lōhaggalē ṇayarē rāyā vairajaṁghaṇāmō ' samuppaṇṇō । sayaṁprabhā vi tassa virahānala- ḍajjhamāṇamāṇasā cuyā samāṇi ihēva jaṁbuddīvē pukkha lāvaivijayē paṁḍurigiṇīē ṇayarīē vairasēṇassa rāiṇō dhāriṇīē dēvīē kucchisi yattāē samuppaṇṇā । uciyasamaē paṭṭāviyaṁ nāma 'sirimai' tti । pattā jōvvaṇaṁ aṇṇayā ya ṇisāē pāsāya- 5 1. sijjihi tti pā. । 2. bahu paḍipuṇṇa pā. pā । 3. dēvabhavaṇā ya kāraṇā pā. । 4. ṇirussuyā ci. pā. । 5. vairajaṁghō nāma sa pā. ।
vairajaṁghakumārakahā 107 siharasaṁṭhiyāē ṇayarabāhirujjāṇē guṇaṁdharasāhuṇō kēvalaṇāṇamahimā gayadēvasamujjōyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa jāīsaraṇaṁ samuppaṇaṁ । taō viṣṇāya pugvabhavavaiyaraṁ taṁ laliyaṁgayadēvaṁ maṇasā vahamāṇī 'ki maha tēṇa viṇā saṁlāvēṇaṁ karaṇaṁ ? ti citiūṇa mōṇaṁ paḍivaṇṇā sakhēyā jaṇaṇi-jaṇayā sēsapariyaṇō ya-- - aṇṇammi dinē rahasi pucchiyā aṁbadhātīē - - " jahā vacchē ! sirimaī, jai kēṇai kajjavasēṇa paḍivaṇṇaṁ mūyattaṇaṁ tā maha kahēsu । jai akahaṇijjaṁ ṇa hōi jēṇa paḍiyāraṁ citēmi ।" taṁ suṇiya vāhajala - bhariya - lōyaṇāē jaṁpiyaṁ sirimaīē- “ammō ! ṇatthi tuha akahaṇijjaṁ ।” tatō sāhiyaṁ savvaṁ pi ṇiyamūyattaṇakāraṇaṁ । tatō tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "vacchē ! ēvaṁ tuha pubvabhavacariyaṁ savittharaṁ paḍilihijjau । tatō haṁ savvattha hiṁḍāvēhāmi । sō vi laliyaṁgatō jai māṇusattē āyātō hōhī tō sacariyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa jāī sarihīti, tēṇa saha ṇivvayahiyayā visayasuhamaṇubhavihisi । tatō tīē aṇumaēṇa sajjitō paḍō । vivihavaṇṇēhiṁ' vaṭṭiyāhi dōhi vi jaṇīhi lihitō cittapaḍō । tattha ya paḍhamaṁ ṇaṁdiggāmō lihitō, aṁbaratilaya- pavvayasaṁṭhiya' kusumiyāsōga - tarutalasannisannā guruvō dēvamihuṇaṁ ca vaṁdaṇāgayaṁ, īsāṇō kappō sirippabhaṁ vimāṇaṁ sadēvamihuṇaṁ, mahābalō rāyā sayaṁbuddha-saṁbhiṇṇasōyasahitō, ninnāmigā ya tavasōsiyasarīrā laliyaṁgaō sayaṁprabhā ya sanāmāṇi । taō nipphaṇṇē cittakammē dhāī paṭṭagaṁ gahēūṇa dhāīsaṁḍaṁ dīvaṁ vaccāmi tti । uppaiyā tamāladalasāmalaṁ gayaṇayalaṁ khaṇēṇa niyattā pucchiyā ca sirimaiē - - " ammō ! kīsa lahuṁ ṇiyattāsi ? " tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "vacchē ! nisāmēsu kāraṇaṁ । ihaṁ amha sāmiṇō tujjha piuṇō varisavaṭṭamāṇaṇimittaṁ vijayavāsiṇō rāyāṇō vahūyā samāgayā, tā jai ihēva hōhī tē hiyayavallahō tatō kayamēva kajjati citiūṇa niyattamhi । jai puṇa ēyāṇa vijayavāsīṇa rāīṇaṁ majjhē na hōhī tō puṇaravi tassa gavēsaṇē jattaṁ karissāmiti । tatō sirimaīē bhaṇiyaṁ - "ammō ! suṭṭu kayaṁ । taō bīyadiṇē gayā paṭṭagaṁ gahāya paccāvaraṇhē āgayā pasaṇṇamuhī bhaṇai - - " putti ! nivvuyā hōhi । diṭṭhō sō tē hiyayāṇaṁdadāī laliyaṁgaō ?" sirimaīē bhaṇiyaṁ—“ammō ! sāhasu kahiṁ sō diṭṭhō ?” tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ puttigē ! maē rāyamaggē pasāriō paṭṭagō । taṁ ca passamāṇā ālēkkhakusalā āgama pamāṇaṁ 6 karēṁtā dēvalōgāī pasaṁsaṁti । jē akusalā tē vaṇṇarūvāīṇi vaṇṇati । duddari- saṇarāyasuō duddatō kumārō saparivārō, sō mahattamēttaṁ paṭṭagaṁ pēcchiūṇa 7 mucchitō paḍiō dharaṇivaṭṭhē । khaṇēṇāsatthī huō pucchiō maṇussēhiṁ - "sāmi ! kimēttha mucchiyā ?" kimēttha mucchiyā ?” sō bhaṇai - 'cariyaṁ niyagaṁ paṭṭaga-lihiyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa maē sumariyā jāī । ahaṁ laliyaṁgaō dēvō āsi sayaṁpabhā mē dēvi tti । mayā ya pucchitō -- “putta ! sāhasu, kō ēsa sannivēsō ?" bhaṇai puṁḍaragiṇī nayarī, pavvayaṁ mēruṁ sāhai । aṇagārō kō ēsa ? bhaṇai ? vīsariyaṁ sē nāmaṁ । kappaṁ sōhammaṁ kahēi । rāyā maṁtisahitō kō ēsa tti । " kā vi ēsā tavassiṇī ?" ṇa jāṇāmi sē nāmaṁ ti । taō māyāvitti ēsō tti nāūṇa maē vi° māyāē bhaṇiyaṁ - putta ! saṁvayai savvaṁ jaṁ tē jammaṁtarē, vīsariyaṁ sō cēva tumaṁ laliyaṁgaō sā puṇa tē sayaṁprabhā naṁdigragāmē paṁguliyā kammadōsēṇa jāyā । sumariyapuvvabhavāē ēvaṁ niyacariyaṁ tava maggaṇahēḍaṁ paṭṭagē lihiyaṁ mama dhāyaisaṁḍaṁ gayāē samappiō ēsa cittapaṭṭagō । paṁguliyāē vi maē 1 taṁ pai saṁjāyāṇukaṁpāē tuha gavēsaṇaṁ kayaṁ । ajja puṇa paṁguliyā puṇṇēhiṁ diṭṭhō tumaṁ, tā ēhi putta ! jēṇa nēmi dhāyaisaṁḍaṁ 12 mēlēmi । paṁguliyāē tuha viōē dukkhaṁ jīvai sā varāī, tassa vaṁcaṇatthaṁ māyāē ēvaṁ payaṁpiyamōṇamāsiyā ahaṁ ।" ēvaṁ suṇiya uvahasiō 1 3 sō dudaṁtakumārō । vayaṁsaēhi bhaṇiō ya -- "ahō tē puṇṇapagarisō jēṇērisaṁ kalattaṁ saṁpattaṁ । gammau pāsijjau paṁguliyati । taō vilakkhavayaṇō avakkatō dudaṁtakumārō । muhuttamēttēṇa samāgaō lōhaggalaṇayarāō vairajaṁghō nāma kumārō । paṭṭagaṁ daṭṭhūṇa sō mamaṁ bhaṇiyāiō -- " kēṇēyaṁ cittakammaṁ lihiyaṁ ?" ti । maē bhaṇiō kiṁ nimittaṁ pucchasi ? " sō bhaṇai - - " mamēyaṁ cariyaṁ । ahaṁ laliyaṁgaō nāma āsi । sayaṁprabhā maha dēvī asaṁsayaṁ tīē lihiyaṁ । tīē vā uvaēsēṇa 14 aṇṇēṇaṁ ti takkēmi । 3 1. vannāhi dō0 ō0 । 2. saṁsiya PĀ । ā0 cū0 । 3. khaṇēṇa ya PĀ । ā0 cū0 । 4. puttē pa0 । ā0 cū0 । 5. agama ku0 JĒ । 6. 0 lā āgamapamāṇaṁ karēṁtā pasaṁ0 a 0 cū0 । 7. pāsiṁūṇa pa0 । 8. kayā ē0 JĒ । 9. ṇa jāṇē sa nāmaṁ JĒ । 10. visāyā0 JĒ । 11. 0 ē vi taṁ JĒ । 12 mēlimi JĒ । 16. avahasi0 PĀ । 14. uvadēsavasēṇaṁ ti ā0 cū0 ।
108 jugāijiṇida-cariyaṁ ō maē sō pucchiō । jai tē cariyaṁ tā sāhasa kō ēsa saṇṇivēsō ?" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ ṇaṁdiggāmō ।" maē bhaṇiyaṁ - " kō ēsa pavvaō ।" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "aṁbaratilaō ।" maē bhaṇiyaṁ kō ēsa samaṇagō ? tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "jugaṁdharāyariyā । maē bhaṇiyaṁ kā ēsa। khamaṇa 1 kilaṁtā ?" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " ninnāmiyā ।" maē bhaṇiyaṁ -- " kē imē purisā ।" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ- mahabbalasayaṁbuddhasaṁbhiṇṇasōyā ।" maē bhaṇiyaṁ -- " kō ēsa kappō ?" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "isāṇō ।" maē pucchiyaṁ -- " kiṁ nāmadhēyaṁ vimāṇaṁ ?” tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ sirippahaṁ ।" ēyaṁ savvaṁ sapaccayaṁ kahiyaṁ tēṇa mahāṇubhāvēṇa । taō tuṭṭhāhaṁ jahā sō cēva ēsa sirimaīē hiyayadaīō laliyaṁgaō ॥" bhaṇiō ya maē - - "vaccha ! nivviyappaṁ laliyaṁgaō cēva tumaṁ । jāya ēsā sirimaī kumārī piucchāē tē duhiyā sā sayaṁpabhā jāva raṇṇō nivēēmi tāva imīē saha tava samāgamō bhavissai ।" taṁ suṇiya sumanasō jātō kumārō । ahaṁ pi ēttha āgayā sāhēmi tē piugō jēṇa tē piyasamāgamō bhavai ।' gayā aṁbadhāī । sāhiō tīē ēsa vaiyarō vairasēṇassa rāiṇō । tēṇa vi samāhūyā sirimaīē māyā sirimaī ya । bhaṇiyā ya sirimaī - "vacchē ! jahāhaṁ laliyaṁgayapuvvabhavavaiyaraṁ viyāṇāmi na tahā tumaṁ ।" sirimaīē bhaṇiyaṁ - "pasāyaṁ kāūṇa kahēu tāō ।" rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ suṇēu vacchā ! avaravidēhē salilāvaivijaē vīyasōgāē nayarīē jiyasattū nāma 'rāyā । tassa maṇōharī kēkaī ya dō bhāriyāō । tāsi ayalō bibhīsaṇō ya baladēvavāsudēvā duvē puttā । uvaraē piummi vijayaddhaṁ bhujaṁti baladēva - vāsudēvā maṇōharī ya baladēva - māyā । kammi vi kālē gaē puttaṁ āpucchai – “ayala ! aṇuhūyā maē bhattuṇō sirī puttasirī ya । tā pavvayāmi paralōgahiyaṁ karissāmi । visajjēhi mamaṁ ti ।" sō nēhēṇa na visajjēti nibbaṁdhē kaē bhaṇai - - " jai ammō nicchitō bhē kaō tō maṁ dēvalōgaṁ gayā vasaṇē paḍibōhijja । si"tti । tīē paḍivaṇṇaṁ । pavvaiyā ya paramadhībalēṇa ahijjiyāṇi ēkka rasa aṁgāṇi । vāsakōḍī ki cūṇā tavamaṇucariūṇa aparivaḍiyavēraggā samāhīē kālagayā laṁtaē kappē iṁdō āyātō । taṁ tāva jāṇāhi mamaṁ, ayalabibhīsaṇā vi bahu kālaṁ samuiyā bhōgā bhuṁjaṁti । kayāiṁ ca viṇiggayā āṇuyattaṁ āsēhiṁ vāyavēgēhi avahariyā aḍavi pavēsiyā । gōvagga- saṁcārēṇa na vinnāō maggō jaṇēṇa । dūraṁ gaṁtūṇa āsā vivaṇṇā । bibhīsaṇō ya kālagaō । ayalō nēhēṇa na yāṇai mucchiō'ti । maṇṇai nēūṇa sīyalāṇi vaṇagahaṇāṇi satthō bhavissaī 'tti muṁbaī । ahaṁ ca laṁtagakappāō puttasiṇēhēṇa saṁgāraṁ ca sumariūṇa khaṇēṇāgatō bibhīsaṇarūvaṁ viuvviūṇa bhaṇiō balō -- " bhāya ! ahaṁ vijjāharēhiṁ samaṁ jujjhiuṁ gata । taṁ maē pasāhiyā । tubbhē puṇa aṁtaraṁ jāṇiūṇa kēṇai mama rūvēṇa mōhiyā । ēyaṁ puṇa tubbhēhiṁ 'ahaṁ'ti maṇṇa- māhi vūḍhaṁ kaḍēvaraṁ । tā ēvaṁ sakkārapuvvaṁ ḍahēūṇa saṇagaraṁ vaccāmō । tahēva kāūṇa pūijjamāṇā jaṇēṇa gharaṁ gayā । ēkkāsa nisā ṭhiyā । taō mayā maṇōharirūvaṁ daṁsiyaṁ । sasaṁbhaṁtō ayalō bhaṇai - " ammō ! tumbhēttha kattō ?" taō pavvajjākālō saṁgārō ya kahiō, bibhīsaṇa- maraṇaṁ ca । ahaṁ laṁtagāō ihāgatō tava paḍibōhaṇaṇimittaṁ । tā paralōgahiyaṁ vicitēhi । aṇiccayaṁ maṇuyariddhīṇa jāṇiūṇaṁ ti bhaṇiūṇa gaōmhi । sakappaṁ ti । ayalō vi putta- saṁkāmiyasirī-nivviṇṇakāmabhōgō pavvaiō । tavamaṇucariūṇa laliyaṁgaō dēvō jātō । ahaṁ puṇa puttasiṇēhēṇa sadēvīṁyaṁ laliyaṁgayaṁ laṁtayakappaṁ nēmi abhikkhaṇaṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ jāhē jāhē samuyaṁ sumarāmi jō sirippabhavimāṇē sāmī uvavajjai sō savvō laliyaṁgaō bhaṇṇai । dēvī puṇa sayaṁpabhā sō puṇa maha suō laliyaṁgaō । jēhiṁ navahiṁ bhāgēhiṁ sāgarōvamaṁ havai tassa satta bhāgē bhōttūṇa dēvasuhaṁ cutō । tammi ṭhāṇē aṇṇō laliyaṁgaō jāō । sō vi maha suyasamāṇanāmō ti । mōhiyamaṇēṇa sayaṁpabhāē saha aṇēgahā laṁtayaṁ nīō । ēvaṁ avarāva ralaliyaṁgayaṁ sayaṁpabhāē sahiyaṁ nayaṁtaēṇa maē sattarasa laliyaṁgayā aivāhiyā । saṁpayamahaṁ laṁtagē cōisa sāgarōvamāṇi aivāhiūṇa cuō samāṇō ihāyāō ēsō vi aṭṭhārasama laliyaṁgaō cuō samāṇō vairajaṁghō jātō । jaṁ sirimaī. ṇiyapiyayamaṁ takkēi । tā vacchē ! "haṁdi ! sugaṁtu bhavaṁtō bahavē bhavaṇavai-vāṇamaṁtara - jōisa - vēmāṇiyā dēvā dēvīō ya jē ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā ! kēī bhagavaō titthayarassa titthayara- mājyāē vā asuhaṁ maṇaṁ saṁpahārēi tassa ṇaṁ ajjagamaṁjariyā iva sayahā muddhāṇaṁ phuṭṭau tti kaṭṭu ghōsaṇaṁ ghōsēha, tē vi tahēva karitā sakkassa ēyamāṇattiyaṁ paccappiṇaṁti । - 140 jugāijiṇida-cariyaṁ ētthaṁtarē kacchamahākacchasuyā nami-viṇami nāmāṇō dūradēsaṁtarē gayā āsi । tē samāgayā piu sagāsamallīṇā niya niya piyaraṁ bhaṇiyāiyā ya - - " amhāṇa vi rajjasaṁvibhāgaṁ karēha ।" tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ -- “natthi mē dāyavvaṁ dāruṇō ya amhēhiṁ saṁpayaṁ vaṇavāsō, ēvaṁ nō tā jāha tubbhē paṇaiyaṇakappapa |yavassa saraṇāgayajaṇa - jaṇaṇitullassa surāsuraguruṇō guṇarayaṇamahōdahiṇō risahasāmiṇō sēvagā hōha । sa bhē tuṭṭhō sayalasamīhiyasaṁpāyagō bhavissai ।” tē vi piyarāṇa paṇa maūṇa gahiyāsikhēḍayā saṁnaddhabaddhakavayā hōūṇa sāmiṇō sabhīvamāyagā । paḍimāsaṁṭhiē bhuvaṇabaṁdhavē risaha jiṇēsarē nalinīdala- puḍēhi jalāsahitō jalamaṇīya paḍihayarayasamaṁtaō jalavarisaṁ kāūṇa jāṇuppamāṇaṁ sarasasuyaṁdhapaṁcavannakusumapayaraṁ mōttūṇa dharaṇiyala nihiya jāṇukarayalā paidiṇaṁ tisaṁjhamavirajjasaṁvibhāgēṇa bhagavaṁtaṁ vinnavēūṇa dāhiṇavāmapāsēsu vi kōsatikkha khaggavaggakarā ubhayakhaggadhārā saṁkaṁtapaḍibiṁbaṁ tihuyaṇasaṁrakkhaṇatthaṁ paḍivaṇṇaṁ tirūvaṁ piva jugāijiṇavaraṁ sēviumāradvā । ēvaṁ vaccai kālō । annayā dharaṇō nāma nāgakumāridō sāmiṇō vaṁdaṇavaḍiyāē samāgaō । tēhiṁ vi vinnaviyaṁ -- " bhagavaṁ ! amhāṇa tumbhēhi na kēṇa vi vatthuṇā saṁvibhāgō kaō । annēsi puṇa jahārihaṁ vibhāgē kāūṇa vasumaī viyāriyā, amhaṁ pi niyasēvaṁ rajjāipayāṇēṇa sahalaṁ karēha ।" ēvaṁ sōūṇa nāgarāō tē ēvaṁ bhaṇiyāiō -- "bhō suṇaha, bhayavaṁ cattasavvasaṁgō gayarōsatōsō sarīrēvi nimmamattō akiṁcaṇō paramajōgī niruddhaviruddhāsavō uppalapalāsamiva niruvalēvamāṇasō, mā ēyaṁ- jāyaha । jaṁ kiṁ pi dāyavvaṁ taṁ dina bhagavayā, davvaō, saṁvaccharamachinnaṁ kimicchriyaṁ mahādāṇaṁ । bhāvaō puṇa sacarācara sajīvābhayappayāṇaṁ । ahaṁ puṇa bhagavaō bhattīē mā tumha sēvā sāmissa ahalā havautti kāūṇa gaṁdhavva pannagāṇaṁ paḍhiyasiddhāī aḍayālīsaṁ vijjāsahassāiṁ viyarāmi, tāṇa imāō mūlamahāvijjāō taṁ jahā gōrī - gaṁdhārī-rōhiṇī - pannattī । taṁ gacchaha tubbhē vijjāharariddhīē sayaṇaṁ niya niya jaṇavayaṁ ca uvalōbhēūṇa vēyaḍḍhapavvayaṁ dāhiṇillāē, uttarillāē ya vijjāharasēḍhīē rahanēuracakkavālapāmōkkhē gayaṇavallahapāmōkkhē ya pannāsaṁ saṭṭhi ca vijjāharanayarē nivēsiūṇa viharaha ।" taō laddhapasāyā kāmiyaṁ pupphayavimāṇaṁ viuvviūṇa bhayavaṁ titthayaraṁ nāgarāyaṁ ca vaṁdiūṇa pupphayavimāṇārūḍhā kacchamahā- kacchāṇaṁ bhagavaō pasāyaṁ uvadaṁsēmāṇā viṇīyanayari aigamma bharahassa ranō tamatthaṁ nivēyaittā sayaṇaṁ pariyaṇaṁ ca mahāya vēyaḍḍhapavvaē gayā। namī dāhiṇillāē vijjāharasēḍhīē । viṇamī uttarillāē pannāsaṁ saṭṭhi ca vijjāharanayarāī nivēsiūṇa aṇuttarē vijjāharakāmabhōgē paccaṇubbhavamāṇā viharaṁti । tē vi kēcchamahākacchāiṇō cattāri sahassā gaṁgādāhiṇa - kūla- kamaṇīyakāṇaṇanivāsiṇō, nāṇābihavaṇagahaṇabaddharaiṇō, vakkalacīradhāriṇō, avvataliṁgacāriṇō, cauttha chaṭṭaṭṭamāi- tavavisēsasēviṇō pāraṇagadiṇē vi parisaḍiyakaṁda-mūla-patta- puppha-phalāibhōiṇō bhagavaṁtamēva hiyayagayaṁ jhāyaṁtā ciṭṭhēti । bhagavaṁ pi bhuvaṇabaṁdhavō saṁvaccharaṁ jāva nāṇāvihadēsēsu nirasaṇō viharaṁtō kaha kaha vi bhaviyavvayā - siririsahasāmivaṇṇaṇaṁ 141 sārahī āsi, tattha maē vairasēṇa titthayarō titthayaraliṁgēṇa diṭṭhōtti vairanābha ya pavvayaṁtē ahaṁ pi pavvaiō । suyaṁ maē tattha vairasēgatitthayarasamīvē jahēsa vairanābhō bharahē paḍhamatitthayarō bhavissai, taṁ ēsō sō bhagavaṁ ti । ētyaṁtarē kumārassa ēgō purisō khōyarasabhariēṇa ghaḍaēṇa samāgaō । uvāyaṇīkāūṇa kumārassa gaō । taṁ samayaṁ sāmī vi tatthāgaō । taō harisavasa - visappaṁtapayaḍapulaēṇa paramāē bhattīē bahumāṇavisēsanivaḍaṁta bāhasalilēṇa sējjaṁsakumārēṇa ukkhittō ikkhu- rasaghaḍō । taṁ gahāya bhagavaṁtamuvaṭṭiō - "bhayavaṁ ! kappai ?” tāhē sāmiṇā aratacittēṇa pāṇī pasāriṁō kumārēṇa savvō vi nisaṭṭhī pāṇīsu, acchiddapāṇī bhayavaṁ, uvari sihā, ācaṁdasūraṁ vaṭṭai na ya biṁdu vi dharaṇīē nivass । bhagavaō ēsā laddhī na uṇa sāmannapurisāṇa । bhagavayā sō rasō pāriō, taō paṁcadivvāṇi pāunbhūyāṇi । taṁ jahā vasuhārā vuṭṭhā, lakkhēvō kaō, samāhayāō dēvaduduhīō, gaṁdhōdayaṁ surabhikusumavāsaṁ ca vuṭṭha, 'ahō mahādāṇaṁ ahō mahādānaṁ ēvaṁ dijjai ēvaṁ dinaṁ bahu phalaṁ hōi dhantrēṇa sēyaṁsēkumārēṇa puṇṇēṇaṁ sēyaṁsē kumārē kayatthēṇaṁ sēyaṁsē kumārē, kayalakkhaṇēṇaṁ sēyaṁsē kumārē, suladdhēṇaṁ sēyaṁsē kumārē ṇaṁ māṇussaē jammajīviyaphalē jēṇa ayāṇuyajaṇamajjhē jāṇuēṇa hōūṇa tihuyaṇalaggaṇakhaṁbhavijjhasō dukkara- tavacaraṇasōsiyasarīrō saṁvaccharāō bhayavaṁ risahasāmī pārāviō । ēvaṁ gayaṇaṁgaṇē surāsurēhi mahimaṁḍalē maṇūsēhiṁ samugghuṭṭhaṁ । ō taṁ dēvasaṁnivāyaṁ bhagavaō pāraṇagaṁ ca sōūṇa "lōgō sēyaṁsagharamāgaō । tē ya kaccha mahākacchā gaṁgādāhiṇakūla- nivāsiṇō tāvasā sōmappahapamuhārāyāṇō ya sējjaṁsakumāramuvaṭṭiyā । tāhē sējjaṁsō tāṇa puraō panavēi - - "ēvaṁ bhikkhā dijjai na uṇa hiraṇṇasuvannāiyaṁ । gharaṁgaṇamāgayāṇa jaīṇa bhikkhāē dinnāē sōggaī gammai । taō tē vi vimhiyamāṇasā savvē vi pucchaṁti -- " kumāra ! kō muṇai tāṇa saṁkhaṁ narāṇa lacchīē jē chalijjaṁti

jaṁ puṇa bhayavaṁ na vaṁdiō na tattha khēō kāyavvō bhāvēṇaṁ vaṁdiō caiva daduvvō । kiṁ ca bahuvigghāṇi sēyavatthūṇi havaṁti । visēsaō tihuyaṇaguruṇō sayalajayajīva - nikkāraṇabaṁdhuṇō jaṁgamatitthassa jugāititthayarassa pāyavaṁdaṇaṁ jaṁ ca tumaē citiyaṁ tahā pabhāē vaṁdissaṁ । jahā na kēṇai vaṁdiō ēyaṁ dina saṁgayaṁ mahāpurisāṇa ēsa । mahārāya ! riddhimaō ihalōgē vi pāṇiṇaṁ mahāṇatthaparaṁparāhēū jahā pavaṇapōyavaṇiṇō riddhimayaparihārō puṇa ihalōgē vi kallāṇakāraṇaṁ jahā pavaṇakē uṇō । rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " kō ēsa pavaṇapōō ? kō vā pavaṇakēū ? " maṁtiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - "suṇau dēvō ।" pavaṇapōyakahā-- atha iva tumha nayarīē aṇēgadhaṇakōḍīsarō pavaṇapōō nāmavaṇiō । tassa ṇaṁ laliya vva lēliyacariyā rūvāi guṇagaṇaviṇijjiyaraīparamaraīkāraṇaṁ pāṇēhitō vi piyā dhaṇasirī nāma diyā । sā puṇa aviyāurī avaccaduhaduhiyā kālaṁ gamēi । annamma dinē tamaṁdhayārāē rayaṇīē vāsabhavaṇapallaṁkāō niruddhapaya-ravā ujjāṇaṁ pai patthiyā dhaṇasirī । pavaṇapōō vi bhaviyavvayā niōēṇa vibuddhō । kahi ēsā gacchara ?" tti saṁkiyahiyaō saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ alakkhiō cēva tayaṇumaggēṇa caliō । sā vi gharujjāṇaṁ gaṁtūṇa sahayārapāyavamārūḍhā baddhō uttarijjēṇa kaṁdharāē pāsaō । tayaṇu- sahayārasāhāē baṁdhiūṇa mannubharabhariyamāṇasā sagaggara- rakkharaṁ ēvaṁ bhaṇiumāḍhattā - - " bhō bhagavaīō vaṇadēvayāō ! laddhō maē āsaṁghiyapēmaguṇō samasuhasuhiō dhaṇaō vva aparimiyadhaṇō pavaṇapōyasarisō daiō, paraṁ gimhayālaravikiraṇāvalī va daha dēhaṁ niravaccayā tā taha karējjaha jahā jammaṁtarē vi pavaṇapōō cēva piō havai na uṇa niravaccattaṇaṁ tti ।" bhaṇiūṇa mukkō appā । ētyaṁtarē " hā ! kimēyaṁ ? ti bhaṇatō vēgēṇa samāgaō pavaṇapōō । chinnō churiyāē tēṇa pāsaō । saṁvāhiyā kaṁdharā satthāvatthānīyā niyagharaṁ । bhaṇiyā ya - "suṁdari ! kimēyaṁ taē mahāsāhasamaṇuṭṭhiyaṁ ?" sā vi bāhāvilalōyaṇā thōramuttāhalapamāṇa- nayaṇaṁsusaṁsittavacchatthalā dharaṇiyalanihiyalōlalōyaṇā niruddhasaddaṁ ruyai cēva na uṇa paḍivayaṇaṁ viyarai । taō sēṭṭiṇā kaha kaha vi saṁṭhavēūṇa bhaṇiyā- "piē! na visāō kāyavvō tahā jaissaṁ jahā tē avaccasaṁpattī havai ।" dhaṇasirīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- " nāha ! natthēttha tuha dōsō jammaṁtarakayāṇi nikammāṇi cēva pāṇiṇaṁ avarajjhaṁ ti jaṁ tumaṁ pi maha puttapaōyaṇē udāsīṇō ciya lakkhīyasi । kayanicchaē tumammi kiṁ na sijjhai ? pavaṇapōēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ---" piē! ayāṇuyā tumaṁ jā ēvaṁ palavasi, majjha vi ēsa niravaccayā vaṇakaṭu-samubbhavō daha dēhaṁ sōyānalō paramappaḍiyārē vihivilasiyammi ki bahuṇā paridēviēṇa ? taha vi jai tē ēsa nibbaṁdhō tā mahāsāhasaṁ kiṁ pikāūṇa tahā karissaṁ jahā tē maṇōrahasaṁpattī havai । avi ya- daṁtaggē ।
gurudussahajāla samāulammi jalaṇē havi vva huṇiūṇa
adhpāṇaṁ taha vi maē tuha puttō suyaṇu ! kāyavvō
aigāḍharūḍhadāḍhafggabhaggatiyasi dadaṁti pucchacchōḍaṇacāliyagurugirivarasiharapabbhārē ॥1266॥
saha- kisōra ṭhiyaṁ sarayaghaṇē vijjulaṁ va kuladēvi
ārāhiūṇa tāraṁ kāyavvō taha vi tē puttō
iya niyaiṇa vayaṇaṁ sōūṇa dhaṇasirī pasannamaṇā

ēsa purisō, na tīrai cālēuṁ tō payaḍēmi attāṇayati । citiya payaḍībhūyā kuladēvayā । bhaṇiyamaṇāē - - " mahābhāga ! kiṁ kāraṇaṁ sumariyā ahaṁ ?" pavaṇapōēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - " puttatthiṇā ।" dēvayāē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "jai ēvaṁ tō pēcchasi puraō jalaṁta - jālāsayasaṁkulaṁ jalaṇaṁ ।" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "pēcchāmi ।" dēvayāē bhaṇiyaṁ -- " ēttha paḍiēhiṁ puttō pāvijjai ।" "jaṁ bhagavaī bhaṇai "tti bhaṇiūṇa uṭṭhiō pavaṇapōō । acaliyasattēṇa gaṁtūṇa pakkhittō tattha appā । thēva vēlāē ya pēcchai appayaṁ kusumasattharōvagayaṁ gahiyahāraṁ puraō kuladēvayaṁ ca vimhiyā māṇasō haṁta ! kahi' sō jalaṇō gahiyahārā kāvā ēsā itthiya" tti citāulō bhaṇiō dēvayāē - "mahābhāga ! tuṭṭhāhaṁ tē imiṇā mahāsāhasēṇa । giṇha imaṁ hāraṁ khivasu niyapiyā kaṁdharāē pacchā tē hārō vva bahuguṇē nimmalajasō suvittō ya puttō bhavissai ।" kayapaṇāmēṇa paḍicchiō pavaṇapōēṇa pupphāīhi sakkārēūṇa visajjiyā dēvayā । appaṇā vi siddhakajjō gharaṁ gaō । sāhiō savvō vi dēvayā pariōsaha ralābha- pajjavasāṇō dhaṇasirīē rayaṇivaiyarō । sā vi pariōsa - viyasiyamuhī nivaḍiyā calaṇēsu । tēṇa vi sahatthēṇa piṇaddhō tīē kaṁdharāē hārō । ānaṁdabharanibbharāṇaṁ vōlīṇō vāsarō । kayadēva - gurusumaraṇō nuvannō vāsabhavaṇanbha tarasaṁṭhiē pavara- pallaṁkē pavaṇapōō । surayasaṁgaraikilaṁtāṇa samāgayā niddā । pariṇayapāyāē śyaṇīē saṁsaṁbhamā uṭṭhiyā dhaṇasirī । viṇaya- puvvaṁ bhaṇiyamaṇāē - " nāha ! imaṁ pīidāṇaṁ ti bhaṇiūṇa mālāmauḍāiyaṁ paṇāmēva । bharahē vi sammaṁ paḍicchai varadāmatitthāhivaṁ sakkārēi sammāṇēi paḍivisajjēi । appaṇā vi jēṇēva vijayakhaṁdhāvārē tēṇēva uvāgacchai uvāgacchittā hāē ya kayabalikammē bhuttē samāṇē varadāma-titthāhivassa aṭṭhāhiyaṁ mahimaṁ karēi । taō cakkarayaṇaṁ dēsiyamaggē paccatthimadisābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā । tahēva khaṁdhāvāranivēsaṁ pabhāsatitthāsannē karēi tahēva aṭṭamaṁ giṇhai rahamārūhai pabhāsatitthēṇaṁ rahanābhimēttajalaṁ lavaṇasamudaṁ ōgāhai saraṁ muyai sē viyaṇaṁ sarē pabhāsatitthā hivassa gharaṁgaṇē nivaḍai । sē vi ya ṇaṁ pabhāsatitthāhivē sara-nāmakkhara - vinnāyavr̥ttaṁtē cūḍāmaṇīdivvaṁ uratthaṁgē vējjaṁsōṇīsuttaṁ kaḍagāṇi ya tuḍiyāṇi ya gahāya samāgaē। aṁtalikkhapaḍivannē jaē ṇaṁ vijaēṇaṁ bharahāhivaṁ vaddhāvēda uvāyaṇī karēi। sē vi sammaṁ saṁpaḍicchai pabhāsatitthāhivaṁ sakkāriūṇa visajjēi । appaṇā vi vijayakhaṁdhāvāramāgaṁtūṇa aṭṭamāō pārēi pabhāsatitthahivassa aṭṭhāhiyaṁ mahāmahimaṁ karēi । pabhāsatitthāhivassa aṭṭhāhiyāē mahāmahimāē nivvattāē cakkarayaṇa- dēsiyamaggē siṁdhūē mahānaīē dāhiṇillēṇaṁ kūlēṇaṁ puratthābhimuhē siṁdhudēvī bhavaṇābhimuhē payāē yā vi hōtthā । taō siṁdhudēvī bhuvaṇassa adūrasāmaṁtē vijayakhaṁdhāvāranivēsa karēi, karitā siṁdhudēvi maṇē kāūṇa aṭṭamabhattaṁ giṇhai, aṭṭhamabhattaṁsi pariṇamamāṇaṁsi siṁdhudēvīē āsaṇaṁ calai । ōhi pauṁjai, jīyakappaṁ sarai viyārabahulaṁ jōvvaṇaṁ visamā kajjassa gaī । apariṇayā tē suyā na najjai kajjapariṇaē tā ēsō dīṇārasahassō āsābaṁdhō tuha maē dinō saṁgōviyavvō । suyamēyaṁ niyaḍiē । aṇṇammi diṇē puṇō bhaṇiyā- “piē! imē puṇa dōnni dīṇārasahassā jai kahavi ajāṇiyaṁ mē maraṇaṁ hōjjā tā tumaṁ mama uddisiyadhammē dijjā, ēhi tuha pēcchaṁtīē nihāṇī karēmi । tahēva kayaṁ । suyamēyaṁ tamaṁtariyasarīrēṇa kuḍaṁgēṇa । sāhiō niyaḍīē ēsa vaiyarō savvō vi saṁcayāē । tāhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ --- "sahiraṇṇā sāsuyā tā aṇukūlēūṇa kēṇa vi uvāēṇa hiraṇṇaṁ gēvhāmō । aṇṇammi diṇē niyaḍibahulayāē bāhullalōyaṇāē bhaṇiyā sāsuyā niyaḍīē - - " ammō । dubbalaṁ tuha sarīraṁ tā vāraēṇa vhāṇa - bhōyaṇa-saṁvāhaṇāiyaṁ tuha sarīrassa saṁpāḍēmō jēṇa suhiyā havai ambā।" paḍivaṇṇamēyāē, kaō paḍhamadiṇē vhāṇa - bhōyaṇāiō savvō vi niyaḍiē uvayārō । bīyadiṇē maharavayaṇēṇa pāyavaḍaṇa purassarō savisēsō saṁcayāē kaō । vaccai kālō । āvajjiyaṁ niyaḍisaṁcayāhiṁ sāsuyāē māṇasaṁ । aṇṇammi dinē samāgayacittā ē bhaṇiyā aggisihāē -- “halā ēhi rahassaṁ kiṁpi darisēmi tahēva samāgayāō daṁsiyaṁ nihāṇadvāṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ca - "halā ! jai kahavi alakkhiyaṁ mē maraṇaṁ hōjjā tā tattha dīṇārasahassō addhamadvēṇa tumbhē gēhējjaha । aviṇīyatti kāūṇa parihariyā silābhāgaēsu । kaivayadiṇēsu lōhamōhiyamāṇasāhiṁ tāhiṁ tāhiṁ paṁcchannamēva uvakhaṇiūṇa aṇṇatya- nikkhayaṁ । khaṁḍiō viṇayauvayārō । kayāi nirūviyaṁ aggisihāē nihāṇaṭṭāṇaṁ । na diṭṭha nihāṇayaṁ saṁkiyahiyayāē pucchi - yāō bahūō । vāhavilalōyaṇāē sadukkhamēva bhaṇiyaṁ niyaḍīē -- "aṁba ! tuha pāyā aṁtarē jai ki pi jāṇāmō । saṁcayā vi ēvaṁ caiva bhaṇiya ṭṭhiyā । kuḍaṁgēṇa vi sāhiō sāyararassa ( -- ḍūṁgarasāyarāṇa) jaṇayadaviṇavaiyarō tē vi vāraēṇa piyaramā- rāhiumāraddhā। viṇayavivajjiō ḍuṁgarō viṇayauvayā rajuttā kuḍaṁgasāyarā । aṇṇayā samāgayacittēṇa kuḍaṁgasāyarāṇa sāhiyaṁ rahassaṁ ruddadēvēṇa । aviṇīō tti uvēkkhiō ḍuṁgarō । laddhāvasarēhi piyaraṁ vaṁciūṇa gahiyaṁ nihāṇaṁ kuḍaṁgasāyarēhi । aṇṇattha nēūṇa gōviyaṁ । payaṇuī kaō vijayauvayārō । taō saṁkiyahiyaēṇa nirūviyaṁ nihāṇayaṁ ruddadēvēṇa na diṭṭha । saṁjāyasaṁkēṇa pucchiyā puttā। taō ubviggamāṇasēṇa vi jaṁpiyaṁ kuḍaṁgēṇa -- " tāya ! saṁkiyāṇāyārāṇa maraṇamēva saraṇamamhārisāṇa sāyarēṇāvi ēvaṁ caiva bhaṇiō । ṭhiō āyārasaṁvaraṁ kāūṇa ruhadēvō । annannōvari kalusiyamāṇasāṇa vaccai kālō । aṇṇammi dinē aggisihāē sāhiō ruhadēvarasa nihāṇaharaṇavaiyarō' । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "ā pāvē ! kīsa taē bahuyāṇa sāhiyaṁ ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - "tumaē kīsa puttāṇa sāhiyaṁ ?" ruddadēvēṇa jaṁpiyaṁs - "bhaṇiyā paḍibhaṇisi ! akulaputtiyā tumaṁ ।" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - "jai ya cciya tuha karē laggā taiya cciya gayaṁ mē kulaṁ । taō kōvāvēsavaṇiṭṭha vivēṇa niddayaṁ tāḍiyā ruddadēvēṇa । mammāhayā mukkā jīviēṇa । aṭṭhajjhāṇōvagayā mariūṇa samuppannā niyagharē cēva bhūyaṁgiṇī । ahiṭṭiyaṁ niyanihāṇayaṁ, saṁcayaṁ vaṁciūṇa giṇhāmi tti khaṇatī ḍakkā bhūyaṁgiṇīē । nivaḍiyā nihāṇa niyaḍiyā mariūṇa jāyā nauliyā । nihāṇanibaṁdhaṇaṁ paidiṇaṁ jujjhati bhuyaṁgiṇi nauliyāō । annayā nihāṇadvāṇamāgayā ḍakkā saṁcayā vibhuyaṁgiṇīē । ailōhamōhiyā mariūṇa samupaṇṇā niyagharē cēva suṇiyā । sāyarēṇa vi mahālōhaladdhamaṇēṇa visapa- ōgēṇa māriō kuḍaṁgō । mariūṇa samuppaṇṇō niyadharē bhuyaṁgamō । ahiṭṭiyaṁ niyanihāṇayaṁ sāyarō vi nissaṁkaṁ givhāmō tti khaṇatō ḍakkō tēṇa bhayaṁgamēṇa । mariūṇa niyanihāṇasamīvē jāō naulaō । naula- sappāṇa vi nihāṇakāraṇā paidiyahaṁ kalahaṁtāṇa vaccati vāsarā । --- 1. vēṇa saṁjāya JĒ । 2. vi JĒ । 2 praṇāyaraṇa JĒ । 3. bhaṇiyaṁ JĒ । 4. nihāṇa vai 0 JĒ । 5. bhaṇiyaṁ jē PĀ 6. niyaḍā JĒ । sāyarēṇa vi0 JĒ । 7. ahiḍiyaṁ JĒ ।

suivōha siridēvakathā- 203 bhōgapurē nayarē suivōdda - siridēvābhihāṇā dōnni vaṇiyadārayā parivasaṁti । asthi dōha vi piō saṁtiyā sirī । sō ya pisāiyā gahiyaggahō karakaya sajalataṁbabhāyaṇō bhamai suivōddō । annayā piusaṁtiē dīṇārē gahāya samāgayā māyaṁgā । bhaṇiyā tēhi lacchimaī tassa ghariṇī -- “ kahiṁ suivōddō ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- gharamajjhē ciṭṭai । imē dīṇārāsaṁgōvē- yavvaṁti payaṁpiya gayā māyaṁgā । sāhiyaṁ lacchimaīē suivōddassa sō vi samāgaō dīṇārasamīvē 'jalajōgō kaō navati pucchiyā lacchimaī । tīē bhaṇiyaṁ na kaō ।" 'khaō nivaḍau dīṇārāṇaṁ natthi sōyaṁ tuha gharē' bhaṇatēṇa vāmapāēṇa pēlliyā dīṇārā । lacchīē citiyaṁ - " ajōgō ēsa pāvō jō mamaṁ gharamāgacchaṁti vāmapāēṇaṁ pēllēi tā tahā maē ēsa kāyavvō jahā pāṇapāṇahā uvahai । mukkaṁ suivōddagharaṁ lacchīē । jāō suhisayaṇāṇaṁ sēsajaṇāṇa ya aṇāyaraṭṭhāṇaṁ । paraparābhavānaladajjhamāṇamāṇasō anivvahaṁtō ya atthatthī mahimaṁḍalaṁ bhamiumāḍhattō । vihalavavasāō caliō niyadēsā- bhimuhaṁ । nirasaṇō diṇaṁ vahēūṇa paviṭṭhō nagarasamāsannāḍaṁbarajakkhadēvaulē chuhāulō dīhadvāṇa parikhēiyasarīrō nisaṇṇō jāva ciṭṭha tāvāgaō ēgō māyaṁgī। pūiō tēṇa āḍaṁbarō । paṇāmaṁ kāūṇa uvaviṭṭhī maṁḍavē lihiyā maṁḍalē jakkhaṇī | kaō ōvā sumariō maṁtō, khaṇaṁtarēṇa samāgayā jakkhiṇī । bhaṇiyā māyaṁgēṇa - - " bhayavai ! saṁpajjaṁtasayalasamīhiyaṁ maha kaē vilāsabhavaṇaṁ nivvattēhi । " tahēva nivvattiyaṁ । taō bhuṁjiūṇa varāhāraṁ vihiyavaravilēvaṇō varavatyābharaṇa visiō saṇṇihiyapuppha- taṁbōlō suhi-sayaṇasahiō vilasiumāraddhō । kayakajjēṇa savvaṁ visajjiyaṁ । taō citiyaṁ suivōddēṇa -- "ahō ! mahāisaō ēsa māyaṁgō, tā ēyarasa sēva karēmi । tahēvakāumāraddhō, nivēsiukāmassa dēi āsaṇaṁ maggāṇulaggō । vahai vāṇahāō " । ēvaṁ cirakālaṁ kuṇatēṇa tēṇa āvajjiyaṁ māyaṁgamāṇasaṁ । annammi dinē bhaṇiō māyaṁgēṇa “bhō ! " tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ atthi ētthēva nayarē jammaṁta radinnamuṇidāṇōvajjiyavisāla- bhōgō bhōgadēvō nāma satthavāhō । tassa gharē ।” tahēva gayā । kaivayadiṇamajjhē vitthariō hiraṇṇāiṇā bhōgadēvō । bhaṇiyā bhōgavaī -- “ piē ! dēhi jahicchāē bhuṁjasu ya sayaṁ jāvēsā karikaṇṇacaṁcalā । tuha gharē dharai lacchī pacchā pāratahiyaṁ karissāmō ।" sā vi sayaṁ cēva dāṇarasiyā bīyaṁ puṇa bhattaṇā bhaṇiyā tahēba dāumāraddhā saddhā visēsaō, jō jahā giṇhai tassa tahēva viyaras | saṁcayasīlasatyavāha kahā -- aṇṇayā samāgaō kēvalī । niggayā vadaṇavaḍiyāē lōya॥bhōgadēvō vi gaō samaṁ bhōgavaīē kayā bhagavayā saṁsāranivvēyajaṇaṇī dhammadēsaṇā । avasaraṁ lahiūṇa pucchiō bhōgadēvēṇa kēvalī -- "bhayavaṁ ! dāṇassa kiṁ phalaṁ ? " kēvali- liṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " visālasālē nayarē duggayapaḍāgō nāma saṁcayasīlasatthavāhakammakarō pucchyivvō ।" uvarayā dhammadēsaṇā । jahāgayaṁ paḍigayā lōyā । kaitrayadiṇāvasāṇē aṇṇatthavihariō kēvalī । bhōgadēvō vi samaṁ bhōgavaīē gaō visālasālē nayarē । bhaviyavvayāniōgēṇa pavisaṁtēṇēvaṁ bhōgadēvēṇa diṭṭhā duggayapaḍāgaghariṇī duggilā । pucchiyā ya-- "bhaddē ! kahi saṁcayasīlasatthavāhassa gharaṁ ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "ēha daṁsēmi । " gayā ṇiddiṭṭhā । pucchyiā saṁcaya sīlarghāriṇī dhaṇasuṁdarī--“atthēttha tumha gharē duggayapaḍāgō nāma kammayarō ! tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- “āsi, saṁpayaṁ puṇa navamō māsō mayassa ।" dhaṇasuṁdarīē bhaṇiyaṁ- " kiṁ tēṇa paōyaṇaṁ ? bhōgadēvēṇa vi kahiō kēvalakahaṇavr̥ttaṁtō। etthaṁtarē samāgaō saṁcayasīlō । daṁsiyaṁ gharamēgaṁ bhōgadēvassa । liō tahi । aṇṇammi dinē pasūyā dhaṇasuṁdarī । jāō dāraō । vaddhādiō gharadāsīē satthavāhō । sō puṇa atthavvaya- bhīruō mōṇamāsiō । vilakkhavayaṇā paḍiniyattā dāsī । satthavāhō vi gharāō nīhariya bāhi gaō । aṇṇammi dinē bhaṇiō dhaṇasuṁdarīē satyavāhō — “piyayama ! aputtāē mē puttagō jāō। tumaṁ puṇa dāṇabhōgabhīō । kiṁ karēsi imāē bhūbhārakarāē lacchīē ?" ahō ! vibhiṇṇacittā ayāṇuyā mē ghariṇī । na yāṇai atthōvajjāṇā kilēsa" ti, ciṁtayaṁtō mahayā aṭṭajjhāṇēṇa diṇaṁ gamēūṇa rayaṇīē visūiyā dōsēṇa mariūṇa samuppaṇṇō tammi cēva nayarē nāgiladāriddiya- dāraō। ājammāō aṇiṭṭhō jaṇaṇi-jaṇayāṇa । mahayā kilēsēṇa kālaṁ gamēi । puttassa vi samuciyasamaē paṭṭāviyaṁ nāmaṁ dhaṇadattō । sō puṇa taṁ gharaṁ gharapariyaṇaṁ ca daṭṭhaṇa saṁjāyajāīsaraṇō' ēgāgī cēva ēvaṁ bhaṇēi-- dāṇa ju

ubbhiyabhyaē ēvaṁ diṇē - diṇē payaṁpēi । aṇṇammi diṇē ēyaṁ suṇiya pucchiō bhōgadēvēṇa -- "vaccha ! kō ēyassa jaṁpiyassa bhāvatthō ?" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "suṇa, ētthēva nayarē duggayapaḍa. gō nāma tāyassa gharē kammayarō ahamahēsi maharisidāṇaphalēṇa' ēyassa cēva gharassa sāmiō jāō । aō ēyaṁ payaṁpēmi ।" ēvaṁ suṇiya jāō kēvalivayaṇē bhōgadēvassa paccaō dāṇabahumāṇō ya । aṇṇāmma dinē bhikkhaṭṭā paviṭṭhēṇa diṭṭhō aisayanāṇiṇā guṇaṁdharasāhuṇā । bhaṇiyā ya-- “bhō bālaya ! na ēgaṁtēṇa harisō kāyavvō । jaō- jō tē piyā saṁcayasīlō adinnadāṇa abhuttadhaṇō hōṁta dāliddiō sō mariūṇa nāgilarōra-dāraō jāō । acvaṁtavēsō jaṇaṇi - jaṇayāṇa । asaṁpajjatapāṇa- bhōyaṇō nirayapaḍiruviyaṁ vēyaṇaṁ vēēmāṇō kālaṁ gamēi । aō harisavisāyā samaṁ cēva jīvāṇa vaṭṭēti । ēvaṁ kahia gaō muṇivarō taṁ suṇiya-- "

ēvaṁ vicitiyaparuṇṇā sadukkhaṁ dhaṇasuṁdarī । taō visaṇṇamāṇasāē saddāvēūṇa bhaṇiō nāgilō dhaṇasuṁdarīē - maha gharē tumbhēhi kammaṁ kāyavvaṁ । ēsa puṇa puttagō na vi māṇēyavvō mahallagō saṁtō ēsō vi maha gharē kammayarō bhavissai । paḍivaṇṇamaṇēhiṁ tahēva kuṇaṁtāṇa vaccaṁti vāsarā । aṇṇammi dinē bhōgadēvō rayaṇīē suhapasuttō mahilā juyalassa saṁlāvaṁ suṇēi । ēgā bhaṇai bhaiṇi ! kā tumaṁ ? " bīyāē bhaṇiyaṁ - " bhōgadēvagharalacchī" iyarīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " kusalaṁ tē ।" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ-” avarāvaradāṇa-bhōgakajjāsattēṇa bhōgadēvēṇa vā varijjamāṇīē āṇāsārasāmi kammayarīē viva kattō mē kusalaṁ ? bīyāē bhaṇiyaṁ -- " tumaṁ kā ? tīē bhaṇiyaṁ " ahaṁ puṇa saṁcayasīlasatthavāhagharasirī ।" paḍhamāē bhaṇiyaṁ - " suhasaṁvāsō tē ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ-" narayaṁdhayāramahallagaḍḍā ēgō viyāē adiṭṭhasasi-sūrakaraniyarāē vaṁdiṇīē viva tamabahula kārāgāra- pakkhittā kattō mē suhavāsō ? niraṁtaraṁ nirōha - dukkhadukkhiyā dukkhaṁ vasāmi ।" bhōgadēvēṇa citiyaṁ" dō vi dukkhiyāō । ahō lacchīē natthi thirīkaraṇōvāō । ēsā hi lacchī na sōha sajjhā' na nāsā ya sajjhā na bhattigijjhā na rakkhaṇatō sirī । dāṇabhōgarōsirī uvayārakāriṇō vi dōsapōsirī visamasīlā na najjai kahamaṇuṇēvvā । jāvajjavi na muyai tāva imīē cāō cēva sāhuṇō' tti, citiūṇa gaō niyanayarē । kāūṇa jigasāhupūyaṁ dāūṇa dīṇāṇāhāṇa dāṇaṁ saṁbhāsiūṇa suhisayaṇavaggaṁ kuṭuṁbabhārē ṭhavēūṇa bhōgadattaputtaṁ pavaḍḍhamāṇasuhajjhavasāṇō kallaṁ pavvaissāmi tti citayaṁtō rayaṇīē suttō । mahilā rūvadhāriṇīē bhaṇiō lacchīē - bhōgadēva ! jahicchaṁ dinnā bhuttā ya amuyaṁtī cēva mukkā tō chaliyā' haṁ taē bhaṇa, kiṁ karōmi ?" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " na mē kāyavvamatthi । suēṇa sahasammaṁ vaṭṭēyavvaṁ" ēvaṁ ti paḍivajjiya gayā sirī । bīyadivasē bhōgadēvō samaṁ bhōgavaīē nikkhatō pasaṁtāyariyasamīvē paripāliūṇa niraiyāraṁ sāmaṇṇaṁ vihivi - hiyā rāhaṇō mariūṇa savvachaṁ gaō । bhōgavaī vi tatthēva samuppaṇṇā tattō cuyāsijjhissaṁti । iō ya sō siridēvōṁ sirīē parihariō paragharēsu kukammāṇi kuṇatō bhō siridēva ! tikkālaṁ pūyaṁtassa vi tē kahiṁ gayā lacchī ēvaṁ sayalajaṇēṇa hasijjatō kālamaivāi । ēyāvasarē uvaraō siridēvassa vilakkhaṇasuō puṇō vi lacchī siridēvamaṁdiramāgayā । jāō sayalajaṇasammaō ।
ēgayā raṇaṇīē varapallaṁkagaō ruyamāṇī mahilaṁ pāsai । pucchiyā ya - - " bhaddē ! kā tumaṁ ? kiṁ kāraṇa vā sadukkha rōvijjai ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - "tuha gharasirī, rōyavvē puṇa imaṁ kāraṇaṁ - - ' taē saha viōgō viya lakkhiyai । jaō-jā taē bīyā ghariṇī pariṇīyā sā alacchī, tīē saha natthi maha ēgattha vāsō puṇō daṁsaṇaṁ" ti bhaṇiya adaṁsaṇaṁ gayā sirī । bhujjō vi taṁ caiva dāliddaṁ sō cēva jaṇaparābhavō' siridēvassa ।

270 jugāiji ṇidacariyaṁ tāvāgaō turaṁtō vimalamaī nāmarāyabaramaṁtī । viṇaṇa paṇamiūṇaṁ rāyāṇaṁ bhaṇiumāḍhattō dēva ! raṇasūrabhiccō dēvaṁ viṣṇavai tumha payapuraō । jai khuṭṭō navakhaṁḍa attāṇaṁ attaṇā kāhaṁ raṇṇā bhaṇiyaṁ āṇēha āṇiō namiya bhaṇai naranāhaṁ । kiṁ nikkāraṇakōvō kīrai amhārisāṇurvāra raṇṇā bhaṇiyaṁ paccakkhadaṁsaṇē kahamakāraṇē kōvō । sō āha sayaṁ sāmiya ! bhōgaṁgakaraṁḍayaṁ pēccha diṭṭhō karaṁḍamajjhē khaṁḍākhaṁḍī kaō mahāsappō । vimhiyamaṇēṇa puṭṭhō raṇṇā kō ēsa paramatthō āmūlāō savvō vi sāhiō vaīyarō naridassa । tuṭṭhō rāyā diṇṇaṁ vatthāharaṇāiyaṁ tassa sāmaṁta maṁti-bhaḍa bhōiyāulē maṁḍavē nisaṇṇassa । ujjāṇāō purisō samāgaō suṁdarō nāma dēva ! tuha malayatilaē ujjāṇē sūriṇō samōsariyā । bahusamaṇasaṁghasahiyā bahussuyā sutthiyā nāma sakkāriūṇa purisō visajjiō appaṇā saparivārō । gayakhaṁdhasamārūḍhō caliō guruvaṁdaṇaṭṭhāē aha tipayāhiṇapuvvaṁ sutthiyasūri namēvi naranāhō । uciyāsaṇē nisaṇṇō dhammaṁ sōuṁ samāḍhatō bhō bhō bhavvā! 274 jugāijidicariyaṁ ēvaṁ vayāsī khippāmēva bhō. khīrōdagasamuddāō khīrōdagaṁ āṇēha । tē vi tahēva āṇēṁti । sakkē vi titthayarasarīragaṁ khīrōdaēṇa pahāṇēi sarasēṇaṁ gōsīsavaracaṁdaṇēṇaṁ alipara aṇulipattā haṁsalakkhaṇaṁ paḍasāḍagaṁ niyaṁsēi niyaṁsaittā savvālaṁ- kāravibhūtiyaṁ karēi sēsadēvā vi gaṇaharasarīragāṇi sēsāṇagārasarīrāṇi ya khīrōdaēṇa pahāṇiti sarasēṇaṁ varagōsīsa caṁda agulipati ahayāiṁ divvāī dēvadsajuyalāī niyaṁsēṁti savvālaṁkāravibhūsiyāī kariti । taē ṇaṁ sē sakkē tē dēvē ēvaṁ vayāsī --" khippāmēva bhō ! nāṇā vihahmaṇirayaṇakiraṇakaraṁbiyaṁ varaṁtarāō vicittacittaharāō । purisasahassava । hiṇīō taō sibiyāō viuvvaha-- ēgā sāmissa, ēgā gaṇahārāṇaṁ, ēgā avasēsāṇaṁ muṇivarāṇaṁ । tē vi tahēva viubvaṁti । taē ṇaṁ sē sakkē sōyasaṁbhāranibbharahiyaē sāmissa paṇaṭṭajammajarāmaraṇassa sarīragaṁ sayamēva ārōhiti ārōhittā mahayā mahūsavēṇaṁ ciyagāē ṭhavēi avasēsadēvā vi gaṇaharāṇaṁ sēsāṇagārāṇa ya sarīragāṇi paramariddhīē sīyāsu ārōhita ārōhitā pubvarayāsu ciyāsu ṭhāviti । taē ṇaṁ sē sakkē aggikumārē dēvē sahāvē sahāvittā ēvaṁ vayāsī - - " khippāmēva bhō ! tisu viciyāsu agaṇikāyaṁ viuvvaha ।" tē vi tava viuvvaṁti । taō cēva 'aggimuhā dēvā' lōē pasiddhi gayā । vākumārāvi dēvā sakkāēsēṇa vāyaṁ viubvaṁti viubbittā agaṇikāyaṁ ujjāliti । taē ṇaṁ sē sakkē tē bahavē bhavaṇavai- vāṇamaṁtara - jōisiya-maṇiē dēvē ēvaṁ kyāsī -- “ khippāmēva bhō ! tisu vi ciyāsu agaruturukkaṁ ghaṇasāraghayamahuṁ ca bhāraggasōya kuṁbhaggasō ya sāharaha । tē vi tahēva sāharati । jāhē maṁsaṁ sōṇiyaṁ ca jhāmiyaṁ tāhē sakkāēsēṇa mēhakumārā dēvā tiṇṇi viciyāō khīrōdaēṇaṁ nivvarvēti । tāhē sakkō sāmissuvarillaṁ dāhiṇaṁ sakahaṁ givhas, īsāṇō vi uttarillaṁ gēhai, camarō vi hiḍillaṁ dāhiṇaṁ balī ya hiṭṭillaṁ vāma. sēsā sakkā dēvā ya jahārihaṁ avasadasaṇē aṁgōvaṁgāṇi ya givhaṁti । taē ṇaṁ sē sakkē tē dēvē ēva vayāsī -- “ khippāmēva bhō ! tiṇi vi cēiyathūbhē karēha । ēvaṁ sāmissa, ēgaṁ gaṇa- harāṇaṁ, ēvaṁ avasēsāṇaṁ muṇivarāṇaṁ । tē vi tahēva karēṁti । taṇaṁ sē battīsa pi suravariṁdā niyaniyaparivārasahiyā naṁdīsaravarē gaṁtūṇa bhagavaō nēvvāṇagamaṇapavvayaṁ aṭṭhāhiyā mahimaṁ pakarēṁti । jaō naṁdīsarassa bahumajjhadēsabhāē causuvi disāsu cattāri vairāmaīō vāvīō pannattāō tāṇa majjhabhāē ēkkēkkō aṁjaṇapavvaō ēgamēgassaṇaṁ aṁjaṇapavvayassa causu vidisāsu cattāricattāridahimuhapabvayā । ॥3525॥ vaccati ॥3526॥
